mmlore: <dark_gray>Delfia, the Empty One, let out a vile screech
<dark_gray>as the swarms of her enemies closed in on her.
<dark_gray>Her sisters, Myropy the Sated, Caelona the
<dark_gray>Quiet, and Ophia the Kind were gone and the
<dark_gray>silence that had fallen disturbed her. She did
<dark_gray>not understand what awaited her as the Silver
<dark_gray>ones approached carrying a prison made for
<dark_gray>another. It would contain Delfia too, at great cost.
<dark_gray>Her surviving sisters would not rest until they
<dark_gray>found her - and enacted their revenge.
Keening of the Empty One.name: Keening of the Empty One
Keening of the Empty One.lore:
Delfia, the Empty One, let out a vile screech
as the swarms of her enemies closed in on her.
Her sisters, Myropy the Sated, Caelona the
Quiet, and Ophia the Kind were gone and the
silence that had fallen disturbed her. She did
not understand what awaited her as the Silver
ones approached carrying a prison made for
another. It would contain Delfia too, at great cost.
Her surviving sisters would not rest until they
found her - and enacted their revenge.

mmlore: It's more of a backronym really...
B stands for Bonk, which is what you do with it.
O stands for Ouch, which is what the victim says.
N is for Night Night, which you tell them when you bonk them.
K is for Knock Out, to be more technical I guess.

K is for Knock Out, to be more technical I guess.

<dark_red>Completion of Sleeping Shadows and 4

<gray>The <obfuscated><#6b0000>lxxxxxxx </#6b0000></obfuscated>stands afflicted with the epiphany
<gray>of its existence. Your memories serve only to
<gray>bolster its nightmarish attacks.
<aqua>Players: 1-2 (Infinite attempts)

Out of circumstance, shadows coalesce and
twist into something utterly depraved.
Completion of Sleeping Shadows and 4
Masterwork are recommended for this boss!
The lxxxxxxx stands afflicted with the epiphany
of its existence. Your memories serve only to
bolster its nightmarish attacks.
Players: 1-2 (Infinite attempts)
Grants access to Twisted lxxxxxxx

mmlore: Hycenea's fury filled the Tree of Life
completely. Molldyer, The Vedha, Laurey,
and Nalatia, each one the absolute of their
domains, fell back in fear. With a thought,
Hycenea sent them tumbling from their perch
on the Tree into the endless darkness below.
They could stay there forever for all she
cared. The seeds were planted for her
Attendants to grow anew. She was free.
Dryadic Resurrection.name: Dryadic Resurrection
Dryadic Resurrection.lore:
Hycenea's fury filled the Tree of Life
completely. Molldyer, The Vedha, Laurey,
and Nalatia, each one the absolute of their
domains, fell back in fear. With a thought,
Hycenea sent them tumbling from their perch
on the Tree into the endless darkness below.
They could stay there forever for all she
cared. The seeds were planted for her
Attendants to grow anew. She was free.

mmlore: In one moment, he felt his love nearby.
In the next, she was gone. The world within
was much like the one he had always known,
the same landscape and the familiar sky,
the only difference was the deafening
silence. Harrakfar traveled the world far
and wide, searching for Hycenea, but soon
realized the truth - he was alone in this
prison reality. From this unyielding loneliness,
madness gave way.
Meshuga.name: Meshuga
Meshuga.lore:
In one moment, he felt his love nearby.
In the next, she was gone. The world within
was much like the one he had always known,
the same landscape and the familiar sky,
the only difference was the deafening
silence. Harrakfar traveled the world far
and wide, searching for Hycenea, but soon
realized the truth - he was alone in this
prison reality. From this unyielding loneliness,
madness gave way.

himself, he would soon find himself
home once again, training with the
dragons amongst His presence.

mmlore: They had done it. The scientists of
Ishnir and Chillwind had created a living
spirit. A being of conscious nature
infused with the power of Keter magic.
It would be the start of a new Node of
the Tree of Life. Below Malkus would lie
Nihilo. Now, to place this life inside their
construction. A new wool would be made,
for the first time in generations.

mmlore: <dark_gray>The ascendant Emperor, Pelias Silvari, stood
<dark_gray>triumphant in the newly excavated citadel
<dark_gray>deep below the earth. Central to the cavern,
<dark_gray>withered and ancient, was a tree, from which a
<dark_gray>silvery aura grew. Reverently he approached
<dark_gray>it, hand outstretched, ready to take on the
<dark_gray>mantle he believed Uriddan once commanded.
<dark_gray>Instead, as soon as his palm touched the bark,
there was a cacophonous noise as the energy
of thousands of Antium citizens cried out
<dark_gray>as one. The barrier rejected Pelias' lineage.
<dark_gray>The barrier rejected Pelias' empire. Instead,
<dark_gray>they all vanished, becoming one with the Machine.
Cog of The Machine.name: Cog of The Machine
Cog of The Machine.lore:
The ascendant Emperor, Pelias Silvari, stood
triumphant in the newly excavated citadel
deep below the earth. Central to the cavern,
withered and ancient, was a tree, from which a
silvery aura grew. Reverently he approached
it, hand outstretched, ready to take on the
mantle he believed Uriddan once commanded.
Instead, as soon as his palm touched the bark,
there was a cacophonous noise as the energy
of thousands of Antium citizens cried out
as one. The barrier rejected Pelias' lineage.
The barrier rejected Pelias' empire. Instead,
they all vanished, becoming one with the Machine.

what being could've begotten the Machine?

For conquest!
For the Emperor!

For glory!
For conquest!
For the Emperor!

mmlore: In the light of the Prophet, it
all returns to nothing.

In the light of the Prophet, it
all returns to nothing.

mmlore: As death loomed over the Crimson
King, he parted the Veil and
found true power.

Edge of Death.lore:
As death loomed over the Crimson
King, he parted the Veil and
found true power.

mmlore: As death loomed over C'Telsket, he
opened his mind to the Veil and the
Veil did the same in return.

Edge of Reality.lore:
As death loomed over C'Telsket, he
opened his mind to the Veil and the

mmlore: You stare into the hooded cloak...
infinite darkness stares back.

You stare into the hooded cloak...
infinite darkness stares back.

mmlore: No typos will bind The Prophet's wings.

was surely sent to speak for the Starts
above.

No shadows will block her light. Anatula

above.

mmlore: I was above, with his secret.
The wool he kept hidden from us
for all those moons. My connection
was severed mercilessly.

Heart of C'Axtal.lore:
I was above, with his secret.
The wool he kept hidden from us
for all those moons. My connection
was severed mercilessly.

that cursed prison. The cage begins to weaken.
Why should your God stay in chains?
I will not abide it. Your council is no longer required."

Hycenea's Chains-1.lore:

that cursed prison. The cage begins to weaken.
Why should your God stay in chains?
I will not abide it. Your council is no longer required."

A tool for a Paladin.

A gift from a father.

of their own making.

power: They must watch every step,
lest they become a slave in a prison

Frost lingers on your breath.
Despite the discomfort, you feel refreshed.

A chill grips your heart and lungs.
Frost lingers on your breath.
Despite the discomfort, you feel refreshed.

mmlore: The eyes seem to sink further into the depths
around you. Distance is held.

Veil's Horizon.lore:
The eyes seem to sink further into the depths
around you. Distance is held.

mmlore: As moons passed, the stars began to shift in the
absence of magic. As Merdd stood watch, it began
to feel a strange presence... watching... It strengthened
its defenses, and hoped this feeling would pass.

Watcher's Warning-2.lore:

absence of magic. As Merdd stood watch, it began
to feel a strange presence... watching... It strengthened
its defenses, and hoped this feeling would pass.

more than the Veil ever had.

known as Void. Perhaps it will offer me
more than the Veil ever had.

mmlore: "I reject my humanity, Fangride!"

with Lilacs and Roses, it was rusted
in the Spring rains.

with Lilacs and Roses, it was rusted

shape of a crown.

will of ancient dragons who once allied with Silver.

<dark_gray>If she so much as closed her eyes, the death
<dark_gray>wind would be upon her. But she would not be
<dark_gray>alone for long...

alone for long...

<dark_gray>ocean, the Silver Emperor instead gave
<dark_gray>cryptic instructions: Remain in place.

cryptic instructions: Remain in place.

mmlore: Without a Prophet, how will His
Light radiate beyond the snow? A
vessel must be built for the Lord's
word to break free.

Brightbind.lore:
Without a Prophet, how will His
Light radiate beyond the snow? A
vessel must be built for the Lord's
word to break free.

mmlore: A pirate worth his salt knows that metal
garments have no place on a ship. The sea
water will weather them to rust and the
waves will drag them below.

Cannonball Chains.lore:
A pirate worth his salt knows that metal
garments have no place on a ship. The sea
water will weather them to rust and the
waves will drag them below.

they called the gaze of the final Herald.
The sky still quivers with fear.

you from watchful eyes. Are these
chains... alive?

Adapting to the crushing depths,
each step alters their form, concealing
you from watchful eyes. Are these
chains... alive?

broke, there was no better use for the
magic than to be worn.

When one of the chains holding the island
broke, there was no better use for the
magic than to be worn.

the long and lonely Winter.

but the greens of Spring lie beyond
the long and lonely Winter.

legacy of the Silvari prophesied their
doom long before Pelias and his folly.
Yet the life of their empire was a wonder to behold.

Chains of Inertia-1.lore:
Death begets only death. The Silver
legacy of the Silvari prophesied their
doom long before Pelias and his folly.
Yet the life of their empire was a wonder to behold.

mmlore: Ancient scales, scavenged by
the Blackflame cultists. What
terrible Beasts once wore
them proudly?

Ethereal Greaves.lore:
A ghostly howl rings through the air -
a chime that signals all to be wary.

mmlore: A voice filled my very being.
It told me I had betrayed.
It told me I must pay.
That the safety of the Valley
was at risk. All because of me.

Folly of C'Axtal.lore:
A voice filled my very being.
It told me I had betrayed.
It told me I must pay.
That the safety of the Valley
was at risk. All because of me.

A legion walks the halls beside you.

Then, alone, his Knights did kneel.

Galemage's Greaves.lore:

the greaves were lost in a levitation mishap,

mmlore: "I don't know how I did it, but I
managed to incapacitate one of the
guardians roaming this forest. It took
more magic than I knew I had in me, but
at last, the Immortal froze and screamed.
I don't know why, but I took the helm
it wore before I fled."

"I don't know how I did it, but I
managed to incapacitate one of the
guardians roaming this forest. It took
more magic than I knew I had in me, but
at last, the Immortal froze and screamed.
I don't know why, but I took the helm
it wore before I fled."

mmlore: "Strange fruit, flitting in and out of

around me. In their wake, are monstrosities."

"Strange fruit, flitting in and out of
existence, keep appearing on the willows
around me. In their wake, are monstrosities."

the flesh is a blessing few have
ever experienced.

had begun to gnaw. From nothing they came.

Their flesh is tough and chewy, yet,

<obfuscated>and the wool were the same now. There

to your whims. Reclaim control.
<gray><key:key.use/> in inventory to store blocks

<gray>within, as if they were in your inventory.

<gray>instead of consuming any blocks.
<gray><key:key.sneak> + <key:key.swapOffhand> in main hand to disable Prismarine.

With just a thought, reshape the earth
to your whims. Reclaim control.
 in inventory to store blocks
within the Firmament.
 while holding to place blocks from
within, as if they were in your inventory.
50% of the time, the Firmament will place Prismarine
instead of consuming any blocks.
 +  in main hand to disable Prismarine.

mmlore: <dark_gray>Razzial's dreams were filled with the call
<dark_gray>of the Outworld. After he helped build the
<dark_gray>containment bubbles, he was desperate to
<dark_gray>retreat deeper into the final space, prison
<dark_gray>clutched tightly in his arms. Entering the
<dark_gray>portal was the last anyone saw of him, glowing
<dark_gray>with the energy of a thousand suns.
Serebrium Dagger of Razzial-4.name: Serebrium Dagger of Razzial
Serebrium Dagger of Razzial-4.lore:
Razzial's dreams were filled with the call
of the Outworld. After he helped build the
containment bubbles, he was desperate to
retreat deeper into the final space, prison
clutched tightly in his arms. Entering the
portal was the last anyone saw of him, glowing
with the energy of a thousand suns.

The Sword of the Exiled has another
form... LASER SWORD!

Once, the Sanctuary teemed with Blackflame.

the remnants of an empire.

bear these sins. I alone can end
them. Whatever it takes.

no man should hold. I alone will
bear these sins. I alone can end
them. Whatever it takes.

that permanently allows it to convert
Architect's Ring Fish into Sand Stickers.
<gray>Consumed by left clicking in mainhand.
<red>Consuming this item cannot be undone!

that permanently allows it to convert
Architect's Ring Fish into Sand Stickers.

Consuming this item cannot be undone!

mmlore: <dark_gray>A bubbling, festering vial of a strange
<dark_gray>liquid. You think it could be used to
<dark_gray>incite a transformation of... something.
<light_purple>* Quest Item *
<dark_gray>#Q<obfuscated>216</obfuscated></dark_gray><dark_gray>I03

Alchemical Reagent.lore:
A bubbling, festering vial of a strange
liquid. You think it could be used to
incite a transformation of... something.
* Quest Item *
#Q216I03

mmlore: <gray>For four hours, while under 50% max
<gray>health, gain 100% knockback resistance.
You feel wrapped in the strength
of the Silver Knights.
<light_purple>* Quest Item *

For four hours, while under 50% max
health, gain 100% knockback resistance.
You feel wrapped in the strength
of the Silver Knights.
* Quest Item *
#Q201I08

mmlore: <gray>For four hours, grants 5% cooldown reduction.
You feel a beastly touch on your soul.
<light_purple>* Quest Item *

For four hours, grants 5% cooldown reduction.
You feel a beastly touch on your soul.
* Quest Item *
#Q201I04

mmlore: <gray>For four hours, deal 7.5% more damage when
<gray>striking an enemy from behind, but take 5%
<gray>more damage when an enemy strikes you from
<gray>behind.
You feel overwhelming forces envelop the
space around you.

For four hours, deal 7.5% more damage when
striking an enemy from behind, but take 5%
more damage when an enemy strikes you from
behind.

mmlore: <gray>For four hours, you deal 20% more
<gray>damage on the first hit to each mob,
<gray>however your healing is reduced by 10%.
Your own blood swirls in the bottle.
<light_purple>* Quest Item *

damage on the first hit to each mob,
however your healing is reduced by 10%.

mmlore: Worth 8 Experience Bottles.
<gray><key:key.attack/> while holding to compress once.
<gray><key:key.attack/> + <key:key.sneak/> while holding to compress all.
<gray><key:key.use/> while holding to decompress once.
<gray><key:key.use/> + <key:key.sneak/> while holding to decompress all.
Concentrated Experience.name: Concentrated Experience
Concentrated Experience.lore:
Worth 8 Experience Bottles.
 while holding to compress once.
 +  while holding to compress all.
 while holding to decompress once.
 +  while holding to decompress all.

<gray>Magic or Projectile damage,
<gray>gain 15% damage for 3 seconds.
You feel mana flow freely through you.

For four hours, after taking
Magic or Projectile damage,
gain 15% damage for 3 seconds.

#Q201I02

mmlore: <gray>For four hours, every five melee hits

<gray>from the Darkest Depths dungeon.

mmlore: <dark_gray>Before, there were armies of Knights. Now,
<dark_gray>their numbers are collapsing. This is all
<dark_gray>thanks to what Uriddan needs. Only his mission
<dark_gray>mattered. As slumbering Knights across the
<dark_gray>world were slaughtered, their essence
<dark_gray>returned to him, leaving a trail of corpses
<dark_gray>and confused and injured people behind.
<dark_gray>All in the service of the great Architect.

Uriddan's Eternal Call (A15).lore:
Before, there were armies of Knights. Now,
their numbers are collapsing. This is all
thanks to what Uriddan needs. Only his mission
mattered. As slumbering Knights across the
world were slaughtered, their essence
returned to him, leaving a trail of corpses
and confused and injured people behind.
All in the service of the great Architect.

mmlore: "Perhaps the strangest thing here is
the way realities bleed into this place.
I've been assaulted by strange humanoid fae,
whispering tales of my death. It's very
odd. They seemed shocked when I didn't die."

Golden Fragment.lore:
"Perhaps the strangest thing here is
the way realities bleed into this place.
I've been assaulted by strange humanoid fae,
whispering tales of my death. It's very
odd. They seemed shocked when I didn't die."

mmlore: The Headless Horseman emerges from the Veil!
<dark_red>Completion of The Scourge of Lunacy and the
<dark_red>Palace of Mirrors are recommended for this boss!
<gray>The Horseman's relentless speed and powerful
<gray>attacks are sure to catch the slow or unprepared.
<aqua>Players: 1-6 (One life per player)
Grants access to The Headless Horseman.
Unlucky Horseshoe.name: Unlucky Horseshoe
Unlucky Horseshoe.lore:
The Headless Horseman emerges from the Veil!
Completion of The Scourge of Lunacy and the
Palace of Mirrors are recommended for this boss!
The Horseman's relentless speed and powerful
attacks are sure to catch the slow or unprepared.
Players: 1-6 (One life per player)
Grants access to The Headless Horseman.

mmlore: The chime swirls with flowing water,
playing a soft melody.

Their life, however, could find new purpose.

around it, slowly increasing its power.

mmlore: This axe once belonged to Commander Haynes, who
lost her life in the Sanctum during the war.
With the Sons' presence encroaching, the Highwatch
scouts have taken this tool to enact what she would have
wanted - the Sons beheaded and the Fortress dismantled.

Sketched Clearcut.lore:
This axe once belonged to Commander Haynes, who
lost her life in the Sanctum during the war.
With the Sons' presence encroaching, the Highwatch
scouts have taken this tool to enact what she would have
wanted - the Sons beheaded and the Fortress dismantled.

mmlore: All memory loses itself to parting ages.
Slowly, their grip on the mind fades,
and they become lost forever.
Tenebra.name: Tenebra
Tenebra.lore:
All memory loses itself to parting ages.
Slowly, their grip on the mind fades,
and they become lost forever.

mmlore: A darkness fell over the Empire. Yeigar
stood to defend his people, but it was
not his people they wanted. A line ended.
A deal was made.
Tenebris (axe).name: Tenebris
Tenebris (axe).lore:
A darkness fell over the Empire. Yeigar
stood to defend his people, but it was
not his people they wanted. A line ended.
A deal was made.

mmlore: Previously, it was the role of nature to decide the fate
of those who had wronged it. That power now belonged
to Hycenea. An ancient power, held with a new cruelty.

Agaric Abhorrence-4.lore:
Previously, it was the role of nature to decide the fate
of those who had wronged it. That power now belonged
to Hycenea. An ancient power, held with a new cruelty.

mmlore: He spilled the blood.
For his sacrifice, his dreams were actualized.
So too were his nightmares.

Aspiration.lore:
He spilled the blood.
For his sacrifice, his dreams were actualized.
So too were his nightmares.

lifeblood still stains the

Behind him was nothing but memories and dust.
Before him, Kaulslund.
A new home for his people.

Johannes' feet stomped upon the deck of his longship.
Behind him was nothing but memories and dust.
Before him, Kaulslund.

in tandem, man must be left in

What madman built these?

for a speedster that never ran,
for a merchant that never sold.

a mantle grown of ivy green.
Bercilak (chest).name: Bercilak
Bercilak (chest).lore:

shimmering sky.

Those with power were born in it.
Those beyond were there when the flames were lit.

Some were forged in the flames.
Those with power were born in it.
Those beyond were there when the flames were lit.

mmlore: When all is troubled and twisted, muddled
and lost, there is respite and peace
with the Heart of the Sea.

Heart of the Sea.lore:
When all is troubled and twisted, muddled
and lost, there is respite and peace
with the Heart of the Sea.

mmlore: When the wind, the fire, and all is gone,
caress me with your sweet lullaby...

Heaven's Lullaby.lore:
When the wind, the fire, and all is gone,
caress me with your sweet lullaby...

mmlore: Heavy and restricting, this
bronzed cuirass can absorb
all manner of punishing blow.

Indomitable.lore:
Heavy and restricting, this
bronzed cuirass can absorb
all manner of punishing blow.

mmlore: The warmth's embrace felt the suffering around it.
The will of the flame stifled slightly in its slumber.
Soon, all would be turned to ash.
Infernal Breastplate.name: Infernal Breastplate
Infernal Breastplate.lore:
The warmth's embrace felt the suffering around it.
The will of the flame stifled slightly in its slumber.
Soon, all would be turned to ash.

mmlore: Skirt along the fire's rim, and you shall
know its heat. Familiarize yourself and
draw ever closer to it.
Iza's Scales.name: Iza's Scales
Iza's Scales.lore:
Skirt along the fire's rim, and you shall
know its heat. Familiarize yourself and
draw ever closer to it.

mmlore: The Jungle felt the approach of outsiders.
He stirred slightly in his slumber.
War was coming...
Kaul's Warden.name: Kaul's Warden
Kaul's Warden.lore:
The Jungle felt the approach of outsiders.
He stirred slightly in his slumber.
War was coming...

mmlore: Johannes' heart was filled with
fear, but he knew what must be done.
He banished the fear, and began
to ring the bells.
King's Warden.name: King's Warden
King's Warden.lore:
Johannes' heart was filled with
fear, but he knew what must be done.
He banished the fear, and began
to ring the bells.

mmlore: The exodus from the capital was long.
Even the strongest soldiers could not
withstand the freezing desert nights.
Midnight Garb.name: Midnight Garb
Midnight Garb.lore:
The exodus from the capital was long.
Even the strongest soldiers could not
withstand the freezing desert nights.

before his eyes.
Salazar's Greed.name: Salazar's Greed
Salazar's Greed.lore:
He thought that nothing could touch
him, even as his world disintegrated
before his eyes.

mmlore: The blessing of Summer,
desired by all.
Sunblessed Leggings.name: Sunblessed Leggings
Sunblessed Leggings.lore:
The blessing of Summer,
desired by all.

mmlore: Drain the life of those around you,
and you shall stand alone. Isolation
breeds enlightenment if you can bear
the weight of the results.
Wadah's Solitude.name: Wadah's Solitude
Wadah's Solitude.lore:
Drain the life of those around you,
and you shall stand alone. Isolation
breeds enlightenment if you can bear
the weight of the results.

mmlore: Viridia, Gem of the Sea.
It shall stand as a beacon
of progress, eternal.
Will of the Empire.name: Will of the Empire
Will of the Empire.lore:
Viridia, Gem of the Sea.
It shall stand as a beacon
of progress, eternal.

mmlore: Fast he hid from battle fierce,
An eye that deeply bled;
The Mountain Carver must escape
the bounty on his head.
Winter's Bounty (legs).name: Winter's Bounty
Winter's Bounty (legs).lore:
Fast he hid from battle fierce,
An eye that deeply bled;
The Mountain Carver must escape
the bounty on his head.

mmlore: One sin above the rest stands out
as the likely harbinger of the end.
Downfall.name: Downfall
Downfall.lore:
One sin above the rest stands out
as the likely harbinger of the end.

mmlore: A relic from the great Bed War, once used
to shatter the dreams of sleeping soldiers...
And then to kill them.
Dreambreaker.name: Dreambreaker
Dreambreaker.lore:
A relic from the great Bed War, once used
to shatter the dreams of sleeping soldiers...
And then to kill them.

mmlore: The strange metal hums
with each pulse.
Pulsating Gold Pickaxe.name: Pulsating Gold Pickaxe
Pulsating Gold Pickaxe.lore:
The strange metal hums
with each pulse.

mmlore: None can remember all lost
beneath the waves.
Shimmering Wave.name: Shimmering Wave
Shimmering Wave.lore:
None can remember all lost
beneath the waves.

mmlore: Your recipients are sure to be
"stunned" when they open this one!
It really is such a mystery...
Shocking Gift.name: Shocking Gift
Shocking Gift.lore:
Your recipients are sure to be
"stunned" when they open this one!
It really is such a mystery...

mmlore: Material extracted from souls still held
the will of that from which it came - a
blasphemy that must be resolved. All
must revere the God in the Machine.
Sketched Earthshaker.name: Sketched Earthshaker
Sketched Earthshaker.lore:
Material extracted from souls still held
the will of that from which it came - a
blasphemy that must be resolved. All
must revere the God in the Machine.

mmlore: The sky reverberates as the heavens
are torn asunder by the gods.
Skyfeller.name: Skyfeller
Skyfeller.lore:
The sky reverberates as the heavens
are torn asunder by the gods.

mmlore: None can remember what was lost
beneath THOSE waves.
Supercharged Sea.name: Supercharged Sea
Supercharged Sea.lore:
None can remember what was lost
beneath THOSE waves.

mmlore: Each swing of this mighty mattock seems
to trace the constellations in its wake.
Each blow shudders the earth.
Supernova Mattock-3.name: Supernova Mattock
Supernova Mattock-3.lore:
Each swing of this mighty mattock seems
to trace the constellations in its wake.
Each blow shudders the earth.

mmlore: Each swing of this mighty mattock seems
to trace the constellations in its wake.
Each blow shudders the earth.
Supernova Mattock-4.name: Supernova Mattock
Supernova Mattock-4.lore:
Each swing of this mighty mattock seems
to trace the constellations in its wake.
Each blow shudders the earth.

mmlore: Sculpt the earth with a single swing.
The Earthshaker.name: The Earthshaker
The Earthshaker.lore: Sculpt the earth with a single swing.

mmlore: "Mana, manifesting as lightning, seems
to regularly pierce the silver barrier.
If I can harness that energy..."
The Overclocker-2.name: The Overclocker
The Overclocker-2.lore:
"Mana, manifesting as lightning, seems
to regularly pierce the silver barrier.
If I can harness that energy..."

mmlore: "Mana, manifesting as lightning, seems
to regularly pierce the silver barrier.
If I can harness that energy..."
The Overclocker-3.name: The Overclocker
The Overclocker-3.lore:
"Mana, manifesting as lightning, seems
to regularly pierce the silver barrier.
If I can harness that energy..."

mmlore: "Mana, manifesting as lightning, seems
to regularly pierce the silver barrier.
If I can harness that energy..."
The Overclocker-4.name: The Overclocker
The Overclocker-4.lore:
"Mana, manifesting as lightning, seems
to regularly pierce the silver barrier.
If I can harness that energy..."

mmlore: A blue flame burns brilliantly
inside the lantern.
<gray><key:key.use/> to reveal hidden
<gray>walls and blocks within 8 blocks.
Cooldown: <#4ac2e5>2s
Lantern of Truth (shovel).name: Lantern of Truth
Lantern of Truth (shovel).lore:
A blue flame burns brilliantly
inside the lantern.
 to reveal hidden
walls and blocks within 8 blocks.
Cooldown: 2s

mmlore: The strange metal hums
with each pulse.
Pulsating Gold Shovel.name: Pulsating Gold Shovel
Pulsating Gold Shovel.lore:
The strange metal hums
with each pulse.

mmlore: The shovel of champions.
Spleef Shovel.name: Spleef Shovel

mmlore: A blade so thin it slices reality's threads.
Careless handling begets calamity.
Accident Prone.name: Accident Prone
Accident Prone.lore:
A blade so thin it slices reality's threads.
Careless handling begets calamity.

mmlore: Even the weight of the ocean cannot
quench life's embers.
Agriva.name: Agriva
Agriva.lore:
Even the weight of the ocean cannot
quench life's embers.

mmlore: It is perhaps fears that stick
strongest in the mind.
Arachnidruid Cutlass.name: Arachnidruid Cutlass
Arachnidruid Cutlass.lore:
It is perhaps fears that stick
strongest in the mind.

mmlore: A snide weapon, etched with clashes of
would-be heroes. With no rider to wield it,
another scourge will take his mantle.
Blade of the Lost.name: Blade of the Lost
Blade of the Lost.lore:
A snide weapon, etched with clashes of
would-be heroes. With no rider to wield it,
another scourge will take his mantle.

mmlore: Only a dribble was needed, but
why waste a fine artery?
Bloodletter's Dagger.name: Bloodletter's Dagger
Bloodletter's Dagger.lore:
Only a dribble was needed, but
why waste a fine artery?

mmlore: Only obtainable by those proven to be
balanced in every virtue.
Bouquet of Gold.name: Bouquet of Gold
Bouquet of Gold.lore:
Only obtainable by those proven to be
balanced in every virtue.

mmlore: The<obfuscated> lxxxxxxx</obfuscated> is not fully quelled. Its lingering
presence is still felt. The effects are still nigh.
The metal aches and twists with anticipation.
Cerebral Contortion-4.name: Cerebral Contortion
Cerebral Contortion-4.lore:
The lxxxxxxx is not fully quelled. Its lingering
presence is still felt. The effects are still nigh.
The metal aches and twists with anticipation.

mmlore: All will be twisted by his might. To be
remade to the will of the Jungle.
Corrupted Geomantic Dagger.name: Corrupted Geomantic Dagger
Corrupted Geomantic Dagger.lore:
All will be twisted by his might. To be
remade to the will of the Jungle.

mmlore: Like the hanging crystals above the
Argone fortress, the prisms in your
hand refract magic beautifully.
Crystalline Dirk.name: Crystalline Dirk
Crystalline Dirk.lore:
Like the hanging crystals above the
Argone fortress, the prisms in your
hand refract magic beautifully.

mmlore: Those sent into the temple were
doomed from the start.
Doom's Edge.name: Doom's Edge
Doom's Edge.lore:
Those sent into the temple were
doomed from the start.

mmlore: With blade from aeons past, swiftly,
they shall breathe their last.
Dragonbone Dagger.name: Dragonbone Dagger
Dragonbone Dagger.lore:
With blade from aeons past, swiftly,
they shall breathe their last.

mmlore: With blade from aeons past, swiftly,
they shall rawr their last.
Enderdragon Dagger.name: Enderdragon Dagger
Enderdragon Dagger.lore:
With blade from aeons past, swiftly,
they shall rawr their last.

mmlore: <dark_gray>A mighty sword, ripped free from stone.
Excalibur.name: Excalibur
Excalibur.lore: A mighty sword, ripped free from stone.

mmlore: The Jungle's own wrath overcame
the power Cazol held over the Sons
of the Forest. Exien's fervor became
Kaul's own fury.
Exien's Sheath.name: Exien's Sheath
Exien's Sheath.lore:
The Jungle's own wrath overcame
the power Cazol held over the Sons
of the Forest. Exien's fervor became
Kaul's own fury.

mmlore: Used in many top-secret experiments. Sadly,
not all involved explosions.
Geomantic Dagger.name: Geomantic Dagger
Geomantic Dagger.lore:
Used in many top-secret experiments. Sadly,
not all involved explosions.

mmlore: Fashioned from fragile glass, adorned with
a symbol that tugs at your memory.
Glass Dagger.name: Glass Dagger
Glass Dagger.lore:
Fashioned from fragile glass, adorned with
a symbol that tugs at your memory.

mmlore: Greed has only one road - to the grave.
Greedy Sword.name: Greedy Sword
Greedy Sword.lore: Greed has only one road - to the grave.

mmlore: A righteous flame rekindled.
Hallowed Gladius.name: Hallowed Gladius

mmlore: It is not the man who has too little,
but the man who craves more,
that is poor.
<gray>With an empty cursor, <key:key.use> on
<gray>the blade to extract a stack of HCS.

Hyperinflation.lore:
It is not the man who has too little,
but the man who craves more,
that is poor.
With an empty cursor,  on
the blade to extract a stack of HCS.

mmlore: Chunks of molten rock erupted violently from its
core, threatening to return all it touched to
ash and silt. Back to the primordial flame.
Ignistone Cluster-3.name: Ignistone Cluster
Ignistone Cluster-3.lore:
Chunks of molten rock erupted violently from its
core, threatening to return all it touched to
ash and silt. Back to the primordial flame.

mmlore: The power of extreme experience,
manifest into a physical form.

Intellect Incarnate.lore:
The power of extreme experience,
manifest into a physical form.

mmlore: What does it mean to be alive? Is it
flesh? Blood? Is it a pulsing core
within your chest? In Irrus' final
moments, she realized... It is not the
Architect by which she defined her
life, but her own memories.

Irrus' Memory-2.lore:
What does it mean to be alive? Is it
flesh? Blood? Is it a pulsing core
within your chest? In Irrus' final
moments, she realized... It is not the
Architect by which she defined her
life, but her own memories.

Justice will be had.

The deeds of that evil beast
they call a shaman must not
go unpunished.
Justice will be had.

The Empire will follow.

Kingslayer.lore:
The first to fall will be the King.
The Empire will follow.

calling for a master.

Light of Salvation.lore:
A memory of light, still shining,
calling for a master.

mmlore: Only for the riches? Simply not true.
We live for the risk, the thrill, the possibility
of losing it all. Such is the soul of gambling.
Luck of the Draw.name: Luck of the Draw
Luck of the Draw.lore:
Only for the riches? Simply not true.
We live for the risk, the thrill, the possibility
of losing it all. Such is the soul of gambling.

mmlore: As fragile as the truth
in immortality.
Monshee's Judgement.name: Monshee's Judgement
Monshee's Judgement.lore:
As fragile as the truth
in immortality.

mmlore: Precise hits mean nothing with
a rapier this sharp.
Myriad's Rapier.name: Myriad's Rapier
Myriad's Rapier.lore:
Precise hits mean nothing with
a rapier this sharp.

mmlore: Layers of barbs and plating reveal
the horrifying truth - the cruel
reality of a monster.

Nettlegold Shiv.lore:
Layers of barbs and plating reveal
the horrifying truth - the cruel
reality of a monster.

candy canes is no longer enough.

mmlore: Memories rise from the ashes, but
fade like embers in the night.

Phoenix Spellblade.lore:
Memories rise from the ashes, but
fade like embers in the night.

mmlore: The greatest power of man is to write
their own history. The greatest tragedy
is for those words to be washed away
by uncaring waves.
Quill of the Emperor.name: Quill of the Emperor
Quill of the Emperor.lore:
The greatest power of man is to write
their own history. The greatest tragedy
is for those words to be washed away
by uncaring waves.

mmlore: The power of total truth,
manifest into a physical form.
Salvation Incarnate.name: Salvation Incarnate
Salvation Incarnate.lore:
The power of total truth,
manifest into a physical form.

pure, life-granting mana. Only through this process
could they create more of their own.

pure, life-granting mana. Only through this process
could they create more of their own.

Those struck by the blade are said to disappear
into the endless sands of time.

Sandblaster.lore:
Donned by the royal guard of the Den dynasty.
Those struck by the blade are said to disappear
into the endless sands of time.

mmlore: This sword feels familiar. The faintest
trace of blood calls to you through memories
lost to the emptiness beyond.
Silver Tithe.name: Silver Tithe
Silver Tithe.lore:
This sword feels familiar. The faintest
trace of blood calls to you through memories
lost to the emptiness beyond.

mmlore: Despite the unrefined nature of the
acid extracted from the human soul,
the Machine found that combining it
with copper formed quite the potent alloy.
Soulcopper Defender-2.name: Soulcopper Defender
Soulcopper Defender-2.lore:
Despite the unrefined nature of the
acid extracted from the human soul,
the Machine found that combining it
with copper formed quite the potent alloy.

into all wounds.

mmlore: Evermore burns the flame of pact.
By Crimson glow, the Veil attacked.
Grow and feed on poor contract.

mmlore: Tavern tales in Mistport speak of a storm that
appears once a century. They say the sea will
thirst for blood, and not even a ghost ship
could escape Her calls.
Thunder and Tempest.name: Thunder and Tempest
Thunder and Tempest.lore:
Tavern tales in Mistport speak of a storm that
appears once a century. They say the sea will
thirst for blood, and not even a ghost ship
could escape Her calls.

mmlore: The storm washes away the stars.
Embrace it.
Thunderfox.name: Thunderfox
Thunderfox.lore:
The storm washes away the stars.
Embrace it.

mmlore: There was an unnatural silence as
Hekawt stepped away from the fallen
capital. His need had outweighed the
need of Al Malakut. He was eternal.

There was an unnatural silence as
Hekawt stepped away from the fallen
capital. His need had outweighed the
need of Al Malakut. He was eternal.

mmlore: Many fall in the face of chaos...
Essence of Service.name: Essence of Service
Essence of Service.lore: Many fall in the face of chaos...

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><white>Right-click within an unclaimed market stall to rent it.
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><white>Provides one week of rent upon use.
<white>Normal shop upkeep is 8 compressed currency a week.
<white>Guild shop upkeep is 24 compressed currency a week.
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><white>You only need one deed. It is not used to pay upkeep.
Shop Deed.name: Shop Deed
Shop Deed.lore:
Right-click within an unclaimed market stall to rent it.
Provides one week of rent upon use.
Normal shop upkeep is 8 compressed currency a week.
Guild shop upkeep is 24 compressed currency a week.
You only need one deed. It is not used to pay upkeep.

be felt in every living thing.

a glimpse of that which is to come.
Pain. Suffering. But also, sometimes, hope.

Divination Orb.lore:
Smoke swirls from within, and you gaze
a glimpse of that which is to come.
Pain. Suffering. But also, sometimes, hope.

honest soul.

honest soul.

<dark_gray>from this place. What is left is a mockery,
<dark_gray>animated by dust from another universe.

<dark_gray>him fall. He must be eternal if all is to remain.

Frost Giant's Boots.lore:
His steps are undaunted. The ice cannot make
him fall. He must be eternal if all is to remain.

mmlore: Protect the Crown, and defend thy land.
Such is the oath of the Chillwind soldiers.
Frostguard Sabatons.name: Frostguard Sabatons
Frostguard Sabatons.lore:
Protect the Crown, and defend thy land.
Such is the oath of the Chillwind soldiers.

mmlore: From farming to warfare, the Coven
had many applications for their
ever-useful golems.
Golemworn Treads-0.name: Golemworn Treads
Golemworn Treads-0.lore:
From farming to warfare, the Coven
had many applications for their
ever-useful golems.

mmlore: And all of a sudden, the breathing invaded.
You can hear it crawling into your head.
Begging won't help now, it won't stop.
Incessance-4.name: Incessance
Incessance-4.lore:
And all of a sudden, the breathing invaded.
You can hear it crawling into your head.
Begging won't help now, it won't stop.

mmlore: A suffocating heat inhibiting the earth.
All who were below it were naught and ash.
Infernal Sabatons.name: Infernal Sabatons
Infernal Sabatons.lore:
A suffocating heat inhibiting the earth.
All who were below it were naught and ash.

mmlore: Rapid, unusual breathing can be heard.
You can hear it churning within stagnant
water. It remains restless, yet patient.
Intermittence-4.name: Intermittence
Intermittence-4.lore:
Rapid, unusual breathing can be heard.
You can hear it churning within stagnant
water. It remains restless, yet patient.

mmlore: Impossibly light for boots of stone.
The tiles seem to rearrange themselves
when out of sight.
Keystone Sabatons.name: Keystone Sabatons
Keystone Sabatons.lore:
Impossibly light for boots of stone.
The tiles seem to rearrange themselves
when out of sight.

mmlore: Above the waves the Mist sails endlessly.
Beneath them its crashing wake is felt.
Lieutenant's Storm.name: Lieutenant's Storm
Lieutenant's Storm.lore:
Above the waves the Mist sails endlessly.
Beneath them its crashing wake is felt.

mmlore: Not through frost nor drought nor tempest.
The spirits walk the space between.
Liminal Sabatons.name: Liminal Sabatons
Liminal Sabatons.lore:
Not through frost nor drought nor tempest.
The spirits walk the space between.

mmlore: Her time spent in Galengarde gave Bermuda
a quite reasonable fear of heights.
She crafted these so that she'd never
need to fear again.

Long Drop Boots-2.lore:
Her time spent in Galengarde gave Bermuda
a quite reasonable fear of heights.
She crafted these so that she'd never
need to fear again.

mmlore: Where have all the roamers gone?
The walkers yet to dream?
Their footsteps make valleys.
Their lifeblood forms the streams.

Old Ice Brogues.lore:
Where have all the roamers gone?
The walkers yet to dream?
Their footsteps make valleys.
Their lifeblood forms the streams.

mmlore: The Emperor stepped into the
perfectly preserved citadel, and
approached the shriveled Tree of Life.
At his touch, the wood erupted
into a buzz of Energy.
When it subsided, only Shades remained.
Pelias' Last Step-1.name: Pelias' Last Step
Pelias' Last Step-1.lore:
The Emperor stepped into the
perfectly preserved citadel, and
approached the shriveled Tree of Life.
At his touch, the wood erupted
into a buzz of Energy.
When it subsided, only Shades remained.

mmlore: To walk the sea floor is to be one
with the deep. Take heed, for the deep
is not merciful, and may not let go
of those in her grasp.
Seafloor's Sabatons.name: Seafloor's Sabatons
Seafloor's Sabatons.lore:
To walk the sea floor is to be one
with the deep. Take heed, for the deep
is not merciful, and may not let go
of those in her grasp.

mmlore: Legends throughout the empire tell
of a great calamity that took place
near what we now know as The Nadir.
A battle most fierce that the earth
itself shook in horror.
Silence of Space-2.name: Silence of Space
Silence of Space-2.lore:
Legends throughout the empire tell
of a great calamity that took place
near what we now know as The Nadir.
A battle most fierce that the earth
itself shook in horror.

Winter's March.lore:
He gazed upon the warring tundra, and prayed
his gift would finally end it all.

the title of Adept, though their Iridium
plate stood as austere as that of newly-made
knights. Efficiency was valued above all else.

Adept's Raiment-1.lore:
Only the greatest of the order were granted
the title of Adept, though their Iridium
plate stood as austere as that of newly-made
knights. Efficiency was valued above all else.

mmlore: In the aftermath of Sirius' fall, the
blighted pods fell inert. With the
right craftsmanship, they have
become something more.

Blightpod Carapace-3.lore:
In the aftermath of Sirius' fall, the
blighted pods fell inert. With the
right craftsmanship, they have
become something more.

<dark_gray>it whispers hatred.

A crude etching of a constellation is
engraved into the metal. Something about

mmlore: Ru'Ten's existence within the Sanctum was timeless.
The fragment is inscribed with thousands of rings,
and splints like the leshen bark of the Wolfswood.
He had remained bound to this earthly prison.
Effulgent Fragment-4.name: Effulgent Fragment
Effulgent Fragment-4.lore:
Ru'Ten's existence within the Sanctum was timeless.
The fragment is inscribed with thousands of rings,
and splints like the leshen bark of the Wolfswood.
He had remained bound to this earthly prison.

mmlore: <dark_gray>Beneath the ice, a heavy heart still beats
<dark_gray>the rhythm of the song he must sing alone.
Frost Giant's Courage.name: Frost Giant's Courage
Frost Giant's Courage.lore:
Beneath the ice, a heavy heart still beats
the rhythm of the song he must sing alone.

mmlore: And lo, did Alric's spear pierce true.
And still his armor held, cracked and battered.
Heart of the Hero.name: Heart of the Hero
Heart of the Hero.lore:
And lo, did Alric's spear pierce true.
And still his armor held, cracked and battered.

mmlore: The metal itself seems prepared to spring
into action at a breath, yet rests as if
it is all it has ever known.
Iridium Breastplate.name: Iridium Breastplate
Iridium Breastplate.lore:
The metal itself seems prepared to spring
into action at a breath, yet rests as if
it is all it has ever known.

mmlore: Along the Ring for centuries the brilliant
empire reigned alone, until a king
who'd turned from God sought power
underneath the stone.
Pelias' Warden-1.name: Pelias' Warden
Pelias' Warden-1.lore:
Along the Ring for centuries the brilliant
empire reigned alone, until a king
who'd turned from God sought power
underneath the stone.

mmlore: Now, as the embrace of death finally
comes for me, I do understand why life
is so short. I have taken many lifetimes
to learn that sometimes it is better.
Rapture.name: Rapture
Rapture.lore:
Now, as the embrace of death finally
comes for me, I do understand why life
is so short. I have taken many lifetimes
to learn that sometimes it is better.

mmlore: The runes inscribed upon the metal
emit a powerful aura. Let them guide
you to a brighter future.
Seer's Runeplate.name: Seer's Runeplate
Seer's Runeplate.lore:
The runes inscribed upon the metal
emit a powerful aura. Let them guide
you to a brighter future.

mmlore: Immaculate silver that lines the luminous garment
recalls a past of the Silver Empire's legacy.
Each fragment lost, found yet again.
Silver Armament-2.name: Silver Armament
Silver Armament-2.lore:
Immaculate silver that lines the luminous garment
recalls a past of the Silver Empire's legacy.
Each fragment lost, found yet again.

mmlore: Oh Silver ones, bestow onto
us your gift. Grant us blood
and flame and we will hold
your seal eternal.
Silverthread Raiment.name: Silverthread Raiment
Silverthread Raiment.lore:
Oh Silver ones, bestow onto
us your gift. Grant us blood
and flame and we will hold
your seal eternal.

mmlore: <dark_gray>Few have stepped outside the protection of
<dark_gray>the Veil. Those who did took great precautions
<dark_gray>to ensure their return.
Stardancer's Cuirass-3.name: Stardancer's Cuirass
Stardancer's Cuirass-3.lore:
Few have stepped outside the protection of
the Veil. Those who did took great precautions
to ensure their return.

mmlore: <dark_gray>Something about the concentration of
<dark_gray>magic in the air up here makes it harder
<dark_gray>to breathe...
<dark_gray>breathe... in... breathe... out...
Deadair Purifier-3.name: Deadair Purifier
Deadair Purifier-3.lore:
Something about the concentration of
magic in the air up here makes it harder
to breathe...
breathe... in... breathe... out...

mmlore: "Rocks fall, everyone dies.
Unless you're wearing your hard hat!"
- Foreman Jorge.
Excavator's Hardlamp.name: Excavator's Hardlamp
Excavator's Hardlamp.lore:
"Rocks fall, everyone dies.
Unless you're wearing your hard hat!"
- Foreman Jorge.

mmlore: Even in the bleakest storm,
I will stand as queen.
Frog Queen's Tiara.name: Frog Queen's Tiara
Frog Queen's Tiara.lore:
Even in the bleakest storm,
I will stand as queen.

mmlore: As you place this frozen crown on
your head, you feel the weight of
an ancient violence and the hum
of an even older song.

Frost Giant's Crown.lore:
As you place this frozen crown on
your head, you feel the weight of
an ancient violence and the hum
of an even older song.

mmlore: Give this to a moderator in exchange
for 80 casino chips!

Frost Giant's Party Hat.lore:
Give this to a moderator in exchange
for 80 casino chips!

legacy of knights long lost grew godly
right to take command.

Iridium Crown-0.lore:
An empire forged from silver false,
a hand to guide that ancient land. From
legacy of knights long lost grew godly
right to take command.

tore open around them, another battle raged
far beyond their understanding. The gnashing
teeth, the unblinking eyes of the unknowable ones
waited with bated breath. Waited, for Her Judgement.

That is the nature of the hunt.

Mask of the Interim.lore:
Patience - to hide and to wait.
That is the nature of the hunt.

minds would save him. But they too had fallen
before Silver wrath.

He knew they would come for him. He thought

minds would save him. But they too had fallen
before Silver wrath.

Shattered Crown-4.lore:
He knew they would come for him. He thought
his power, those ancient prisons of still-older
minds would save him. But they too had fallen
before Silver wrath.

mmlore: Despite the grisly origin of the
Machine's endless movement, the air
within was serene; the wind imbibed with
a pleasant scent.

Air-Purified Thresher-2.lore:
Despite the grisly origin of the
Machine's endless movement, the air
within was serene; the wind imbibed with
a pleasant scent.

mmlore: In the wee hours of the night,
even practitioners of the dark
arts make time for sweets.
Arcane Confection.name: Arcane Confection
Arcane Confection.lore:
In the wee hours of the night,
even practitioners of the dark
arts make time for sweets.

mmlore: In the end, they were cut down one by one...
a worthy song for such traitors.
Blasphemer's Sickle.name: Blasphemer's Sickle
Blasphemer's Sickle.lore:
In the end, they were cut down one by one...
a worthy song for such traitors.

mmlore: Each swing drinks deeply of
the magic flooding the very
air of the fallen Forum.
Bloody Fang.name: Bloody Fang
Bloody Fang.lore:
Each swing drinks deeply of
the magic flooding the very
air of the fallen Forum.

mmlore: Forged within the halls of a mighty bastion,
the scythe still carries the frozen winds
of a foreign land.
Coldsteel Blunt.name: Coldsteel Blunt
Coldsteel Blunt.lore:
Forged within the halls of a mighty bastion,
the scythe still carries the frozen winds
of a foreign land.

mmlore: "Two worlds in a lullaby, neither alike.
What might happen if we weave them together?
Now watch as both twine together into one."
Fateweaver.name: Fateweaver
Fateweaver.lore:
"Two worlds in a lullaby, neither alike.
What might happen if we weave them together?
Now watch as both twine together into one."

mmlore: When work was done a rest deserved,
so slumber did these gods. But soon
the waking ones did rise and for
their power clawed.
Frost Giant's Crescent.name: Frost Giant's Crescent
Frost Giant's Crescent.lore:
When work was done a rest deserved,
so slumber did these gods. But soon
the waking ones did rise and for
their power clawed.

mmlore: The scythe, relinquished through
many tavern gambles, seems to bring
fortune to its owner... until their
luck runs out.
Gambler's Cane.name: Gambler's Cane
Gambler's Cane.lore:
The scythe, relinquished through
many tavern gambles, seems to bring
fortune to its owner... until their
luck runs out.

mmlore: It takes great knowledge to supersede
biology, but even greater wisdom to
understand the consequences.
Gillman's Claw.name: Gillman's Claw
Gillman's Claw.lore:
It takes great knowledge to supersede
biology, but even greater wisdom to
understand the consequences.

mmlore: Misty taste of Moonshine,
teardrops in my eye...
Hightide Moonshine.name: Hightide Moonshine
Hightide Moonshine.lore:
Misty taste of Moonshine,
teardrops in my eye...

mmlore: Nothing known can cut the True Ice, yet
this tooth slices through like a hot knife!
Surely this is of use to our archeologists!
Hrimnir's Incisor.name: Hrimnir's Incisor
Hrimnir's Incisor.lore:
Nothing known can cut the True Ice, yet
this tooth slices through like a hot knife!
Surely this is of use to our archeologists!

followers, the will of the all-mother is
executed by the council. As she is absolute,
so too are those four.

Hycenea's Will-0.lore:
Too ancient for the plights of her mortal
followers, the will of the all-mother is
executed by the council. As she is absolute,
so too are those four.

mmlore: Death's touch is a cold one.
Ice Reaper.name: Ice Reaper
Ice Reaper.lore: Death's touch is a cold one.

mmlore: This was used many times to protect a man's
daughter. Now you may use it to protect others.
Iron Pipe.name: Iron Pipe
Iron Pipe.lore:
This was used many times to protect a man's
daughter. Now you may use it to protect others.

mmlore: Keep on goin' 'til you get someplace
where you can truly rest.
Longtime Sunshine.name: Longtime Sunshine
Longtime Sunshine.lore:
Keep on goin' 'til you get someplace
where you can truly rest.

mmlore: Molten rock or molten chocolate;
with temperatures like these
it doesn't matter what it was.
Magma Cake.name: Magma Cake

mmlore: Crack the sky with a scattered beam.
Mirrorshard Scythe.name: Mirrorshard Scythe
Mirrorshard Scythe.lore: Crack the sky with a scattered beam.

mmlore: The Captain was gone, taken deeper into
the island's maw. The rest were left above,
now driven mad by unquenchable greed.
Mutiny.name: Mutiny
Mutiny.lore:
The Captain was gone, taken deeper into
the island's maw. The rest were left above,
now driven mad by unquenchable greed.

mmlore: Hydrothermal calcification formed an explosive
mineral used here, carefully affixed, but
not so carefully swung.
Phlogiston Fissure.name: Phlogiston Fissure
Phlogiston Fissure.lore:
Hydrothermal calcification formed an explosive
mineral used here, carefully affixed, but
not so carefully swung.

depths that must be purged.

The tides cannot remain silent for
long. There is a disturbance in the
depths that must be purged.

their legions.

mmlore: Each wound inflicted with this weapon disperses
the victim's blood circulation. In time,
the blood begins to boil, bringing terrible
agony to the unfortunate.

Veinshredder-2.lore:
Each wound inflicted with this weapon disperses
the victim's blood circulation. In time,
the blood begins to boil, bringing terrible
agony to the unfortunate.

Enriched Eridium Ingot.lore:
It hums with power. Coveted by
those who hunt for vaults.

mmlore: Concentration. Focus. Long-term thinking.
Those are the qualities that separate a
Captain from a flailing crewman.
Outer Rim Fragment.name: Outer Rim Fragment
Outer Rim Fragment.lore:
Concentration. Focus. Long-term thinking.
Those are the qualities that separate a
Captain from a flailing crewman.

mmlore: A trophy awarded to the
#2 submission in the Monumenta
2020 Screenshot Competition.
Silver Camera.name: Silver Camera
Silver Camera.lore:
A trophy awarded to the
#2 submission in the Monumenta
2020 Screenshot Competition.

mmlore: Tyranny, fratricide, mad searching for the lost
relics of the Silver Knights concealed one
simple truth. Ambitious attempts to revive the
great Silvari empire were not meant to succeed.

Belt of the Tyrant-2.lore:
Tyranny, fratricide, mad searching for the lost
relics of the Silver Knights concealed one
simple truth. Ambitious attempts to revive the
great Silvari empire were not meant to succeed.

to retake her laboratory, but in the end
even Steelmeld tech was no match for the
endless corrupted machines.

Circuit Breaker-2.lore:
Bermuda forged this suit in an attempt
to retake her laboratory, but in the end
even Steelmeld tech was no match for the
endless corrupted machines.

the lightweight nature of Iridium granting
them an elegance and alacrity rarely seen
after the fall.

Dignified Greaves-0.lore:
Silvari Captains valued speed over strength,
the lightweight nature of Iridium granting
them an elegance and alacrity rarely seen
after the fall.

mmlore: An eternity, damned to the hellfires.
A soul, corrupted by their power.
Eternity.name: Eternity
Eternity.lore:
An eternity, damned to the hellfires.
A soul, corrupted by their power.

mmlore: <dark_gray>He wades through the fury of the blizzard,
<dark_gray>untouched by the ants below his feet.
Frost Giant's Leggings.name: Frost Giant's Leggings
Frost Giant's Leggings.lore:
He wades through the fury of the blizzard,
untouched by the ants below his feet.

mmlore: Strength and resolve are the only things
that endure in the Chillwind Tundra.
Frost Knight's Greaves.name: Frost Knight's Greaves
Frost Knight's Greaves.lore:
Strength and resolve are the only things
that endure in the Chillwind Tundra.

mmlore: Garrisons of Witchknights were sent by Hycenea
to defend Harrakfar from being taken by the
Silver Order. Deep gashes upon the greaves
evoke memories of the Knights' violent magic,
against the tempered steel of the Coven.
Greaves of Sunken Faith-4.name: Greaves of Sunken Faith
Greaves of Sunken Faith-4.lore:
Garrisons of Witchknights were sent by Hycenea
to defend Harrakfar from being taken by the
Silver Order. Deep gashes upon the greaves
evoke memories of the Knights' violent magic,
against the tempered steel of the Coven.

mmlore: As the scourge of battle beset the land,
the hammers turned to swords.
Ice was shaped to armor
as the giants stood for war.
Icicle Greaves.name: Icicle Greaves
Icicle Greaves.lore:
As the scourge of battle beset the land,
the hammers turned to swords.
Ice was shaped to armor
as the giants stood for war.

<dark_gray>by something that would last longer than
<dark_gray>even the final threads of the Veil.

Immortal Flame-1.lore:

faded, their forges were fueled
by something that would last longer than
even the final threads of the Veil.

elegance to tranquility earned. There
is a power to patience.

Iridium Greaves.lore:
Unmoving, yet unrusted, there is an
elegance to tranquility earned. There
is a power to patience.

his men to cleave the earth until he'd
found that power lost- yet from it,
he would gain no worth.

Pelias' Greaves-0.lore:

his men to cleave the earth until he'd
found that power lost- yet from it,
he would gain no worth.

energy. Perhaps its power can be
harnessed into a vessel...

mmlore: A distant chime echoes,
slowly fading away.

Moon's Chime.lore:
A distant chime echoes,
slowly fading away.

unfortunate enough to be claimed by the Outworld.
An ever-changing landscape, leaving no witnesses.

Serebrium Ring-3.lore:
A polished ring, remarking the absence of those
unfortunate enough to be claimed by the Outworld.
An ever-changing landscape, leaving no witnesses.

<dark_gray>With information comes power.

Silver Memory Fragment.lore:
The Record-Keeper may be able to glean
information from enough of these.
With information comes power.

mmlore: <gray>Epic Crafting Material
The final vestiges of a once great order,
now consigned to clean up its own mess.
Silver Remnant.name: Silver Remnant
Silver Remnant.lore:
Epic Crafting Material
The final vestiges of a once great order,
now consigned to clean up its own mess.

mmlore: Strike while the rocks are warm, for a
city must be built. A haven, void of war.
A gift to the world.
Adze of the Ebb.name: Adze of the Ebb
Adze of the Ebb.lore:
Strike while the rocks are warm, for a
city must be built. A haven, void of war.
A gift to the world.

mmlore: Enhanced to the point of brilliant
precision. Unfortunately, that precision
has a price.
Aquatic Adze.name: Aquatic Adze
Aquatic Adze.lore:
Enhanced to the point of brilliant
precision. Unfortunately, that precision
has a price.

mmlore: The skies trembled and the ground quaked,
but the vanguard pushed on.
Blitzkrieg.name: Blitzkrieg
Blitzkrieg.lore:
The skies trembled and the ground quaked,
but the vanguard pushed on.

mmlore: Hunger courses through the veins
of this plantlike pick. Turn it
to your benefit - or else.
Dionaeas Graft.name: Dionaeas Graft
Dionaeas Graft.lore:
Hunger courses through the veins
of this plantlike pick. Turn it
to your benefit - or else.

mmlore: The Sons of the Forest's dig to Kaul was
never meant to succeed. Cazol had other plans.
He needed the Genius Loci furious. It was
time to wake the nightmare.
Forest's Gambit (pickaxe).name: Forest's Gambit
Forest's Gambit (pickaxe).lore:
The Sons of the Forest's dig to Kaul was
never meant to succeed. Cazol had other plans.
He needed the Genius Loci furious. It was
time to wake the nightmare.

mmlore: The longboats arrived upon fresh
shores. Soon, Johannes' people would
build a new home. A safe haven for
the Narsen people.
King's Dolabra (pickaxe).name: King's Dolabra
King's Dolabra (pickaxe).lore:
The longboats arrived upon fresh
shores. Soon, Johannes' people would
build a new home. A safe haven for
the Narsen people.

mmlore: Your blood. Your bones. Your strength.
It all shall go to serve the Pharaohs.
This is what happens when filth defies
the chosen.
Molta's Labor.name: Molta's Labor
Molta's Labor.lore:
Your blood. Your bones. Your strength.
It all shall go to serve the Pharaohs.
This is what happens when filth defies
the chosen.

mmlore: Burn by the poison of the
deadly nightshade.
Nightshade Pickaxe.name: Nightshade Pickaxe
Nightshade Pickaxe.lore:
Burn by the poison of the
deadly nightshade.

mmlore: The Voice is worship; Follow the Inner
path; Speak only in True Need.
Notched Pickaxe.name: Notched Pickaxe
Notched Pickaxe.lore:
The Voice is worship; Follow the Inner
path; Speak only in True Need.

mmlore: Fashioned from a conduit, the metal
pulses with the same energy.

Ocean's Bounty.lore:
Fashioned from a conduit, the metal
pulses with the same energy.

mmlore: <dark_gray>Isadora had done all she had wanted to do.
<dark_gray>Eleven years of peace. A strong family.
<dark_gray>An Empire worthy of Abeliar. It was time now
<dark_gray>to give control to her eldest son. He would
<dark_gray>carry on her legacy. Of this she was sure.

Queen's Dolabra (pickaxe).lore:
Isadora had done all she had wanted to do.
Eleven years of peace. A strong family.
An Empire worthy of Abeliar. It was time now
to give control to her eldest son. He would
carry on her legacy. Of this she was sure.

mmlore: Handle with care.
Red Hot Pickaxe.name: Red Hot Pickaxe

mmlore: <dark_gray>A gift from our Lord On High
<dark_gray>rests below. Break through the
<dark_gray>ice and bask in the light of eternity.
<dark_gray>As you sink, you soon too will see.
Shattershine.name: Shattershine
Shattershine.lore:
A gift from our Lord On High
rests below. Break through the
ice and bask in the light of eternity.
As you sink, you soon too will see.

mmlore: From the highest peak, all
else appears miniscule.

Summit's Conquest.lore:
From the highest peak, all
else appears miniscule.

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>It forces one to ponder upon the
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>the nature of their own reflection.
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><gray>- Right click while holding to be transfered
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><gray>from the corrupted world to the normal world.
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><gray>- Left click while holding to reset the
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><gray>temple to the way you found it.
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><light_purple>* Quest Item *
Magic Mirror.name: Magic Mirror
Magic Mirror.lore:
It forces one to ponder upon the
the nature of their own reflection.
- Right click while holding to be transfered
from the corrupted world to the normal world.
- Left click while holding to reset the
temple to the way you found it.
* Quest Item *
#Q110I05

mmlore: Bend and break.
Morphic Breaker (shovel).name: Morphic Breaker

<dark_gray>smoldering Forge below Antium, but there
<dark_gray>was a horror hidden below he had not
<dark_gray>anticipated - an Exhibitor, while the Knights
<dark_gray>above marched on another land.

Aggripa's Gearshredder-2.lore:
The whispers had drawn Aggripa into the
smoldering Forge below Antium, but there
was a horror hidden below he had not
anticipated - an Exhibitor, while the Knights
above marched on another land.

mmlore: Strength lies not only with brute force,
but the ability to control it. Such is
the wisdom of the Son of Flame.
Akam's Ferocity.name: Akam's Ferocity
Akam's Ferocity.lore:
Strength lies not only with brute force,
but the ability to control it. Such is
the wisdom of the Son of Flame.

mmlore: Kokytos, we see The Revelation of Alei.
The arc of history bends towards the will of your Prophets.
The sky will shatter soon enough -
and descend upon the sinful.
Alei's Arc.name: Alei's Arc
Alei's Arc.lore:
Kokytos, we see The Revelation of Alei.
The arc of history bends towards the will of your Prophets.
The sky will shatter soon enough -
and descend upon the sinful.

mmlore: Arcane flames dance off of the steel,
burning with intensity but emitting
no heat. The blade stays lit even when
plunged into the sea.
Amaranth Blade.name: Amaranth Blade
Amaranth Blade.lore:
Arcane flames dance off of the steel,
burning with intensity but emitting
no heat. The blade stays lit even when
plunged into the sea.

mmlore: Magic was the weapon of the royals.
Elcard knew and prepared for this.
But a dagger could not save him
from the bomb in his brain.
Antimagic Ward.name: Antimagic Ward
Antimagic Ward.lore:
Magic was the weapon of the royals.
Elcard knew and prepared for this.
But a dagger could not save him
from the bomb in his brain.

mmlore: A relic of The Architect being here is an
alarming find. What could have brought this
here - and why was it needed?
Architect's Dagger.name: Architect's Dagger
Architect's Dagger.lore:
A relic of The Architect being here is an
alarming find. What could have brought this
here - and why was it needed?

mmlore: After Markus' mother died, he was expelled from the manor.
Pelias' lack of use for him saved him from consumption.
Despite his failure, the Architect had spared him.
He would spend the rest of his life in penance.
Argentum Arbitrium-2.name: Argentum Arbitrium
Argentum Arbitrium-2.lore:
After Markus' mother died, he was expelled from the manor.
Pelias' lack of use for him saved him from consumption.
Despite his failure, the Architect had spared him.
He would spend the rest of his life in penance.

Ashed Zweihnder.lore:

mmlore: We shall descend upon this city and
show these savages true power.

Beastblight Machete.lore:
We shall descend upon this city and
show these savages true power.

but so too would the innocents.

Betrayer of the Blackflame.lore:
Silence fell over the Blackflame as the
Beast struck. He would pay for his choice,
but so too would the innocents.

through the air as you swing it.

Blade of Exaltation.lore:

blade. A slight trail of silver arcs
through the air as you swing it.

<dark_gray>hideout. In the process, bonds would
<dark_gray>be forged and Masks would be broken.

Blade of Reclamation-2.lore:
The Dichen offered the Narsen Crew
support in the assault on the Masked
hideout. In the process, bonds would
be forged and Masks would be broken.

an excellent dipping sauce.

Bloodthirsty Croissant.lore:
Let the blood of the lesser ...make
an excellent dipping sauce.

mmlore: Bring them to their knees.
Bloom.name: Bloom

mmlore: <dark_gray>There must be a way to reshape the bones.

Bonebender.lore:

The magic within longs to be shaped anew.

mmlore: A broken sheath, could be repaired.

Broken Sheath.lore: A broken sheath, could be repaired.

mmlore: A broken blade, could be repaired.

Broken Sword.lore: A broken blade, could be repaired.

mmlore: There is only one thing left to
do. Claim what is hers.

Broken Will.lore:

do. Claim what is hers.

often performed to mark the passing
of royalty.

often performed to mark the passing
of royalty.

Celsian Heraldic Blade.lore:

descend from foreign lands.

mmlore: Not a step back, impale the marauders
upon this line!

Celsian Sarissa.lore:
Not a step back, impale the marauders
upon this line!

mmlore: Bathed in the pools of Kokytos beneath the
ice, the next Prophet waits. With His breath,
the binds of frost and sky will shatter.
His word will be revealed.

Chainbreaker's Blight.lore:
Bathed in the pools of Kokytos beneath the
ice, the next Prophet waits. With His breath,
the binds of frost and sky will shatter.
His word will be revealed.

mmlore: A name so legendary it
transcends realms.
Chunchunmaru.name: Chunchunmaru
Chunchunmaru.lore:
A name so legendary it
transcends realms.

Powerful, yet still corrupted.

This dagger did.

Dissonant Dagger.lore:
Nothing should change what must happen.
This dagger did.

mmlore: Indeed, it was like a
heap of raw iron.

Eclipse Splitter.lore:
Indeed, it was like a
heap of raw iron.

mmlore: Magical energy whirs around the
blade, forming a hurricane with
which to smite your foes.

Energized Maelstrom.lore:

blade, forming a hurricane with

much more is lost.

much more is lost.

The fury of steel, silenced, but not forgotten.

A faint song echoes through the storming
snow. Another Waker has fallen.

mmlore: So out set Alric, brave and strong,
his steel clutched tight in hand. The
icy chill would gnaw his bones, but
blood was his demand.

Frost Giant's Greatsword.lore:
So out set Alric, brave and strong,
his steel clutched tight in hand. The
icy chill would gnaw his bones, but
blood was his demand.

Harmonic Wrath.lore:
Balance. Harmony. Unity. All entwined,
for the good of all.

Magistruct Breaker.lore:

swallowed by the beyond.

The last remnants of a fallen crew,
swallowed by the beyond.

mmlore: <dark_gray>Serceeal, the Silver Beast, volunteered for
<dark_gray>the placement of the Loamskattar's prison.
<dark_gray>It wasn't clear why he was so eager to seek
<dark_gray>his Vigil, but there were whispers that he
<dark_gray>could survive the depths of the Void with ease.
<dark_gray>It remains to be seen if this was true.
Silver Fang of Serceeal-4.name: Silver Fang of Serceeal
Silver Fang of Serceeal-4.lore:
Serceeal, the Silver Beast, volunteered for
the placement of the Loamskattar's prison.
It wasn't clear why he was so eager to seek
his Vigil, but there were whispers that he
could survive the depths of the Void with ease.
It remains to be seen if this was true.

mmlore: <dark_gray>The blade is stained with a silvery
<dark_gray>substance, left from when you pulled the
<dark_gray>blade from the body of the Silver Knight.
Silver Knight's Failure.name: Silver Knight's Failure
Silver Knight's Failure.lore:
The blade is stained with a silvery
substance, left from when you pulled the
blade from the body of the Silver Knight.

mmlore: A good ol' prod, it's still quite hot!
Stablemaster's Prod.name: Stablemaster's Prod
Stablemaster's Prod.lore: A good ol' prod, it's still quite hot!

mmlore: On one end lies the halls of Wonder.
The seas fascinate the mind,
but there is danger in its beauty.
Steel Maelstrom.name: Steel Maelstrom
Steel Maelstrom.lore:
On one end lies the halls of Wonder.
The seas fascinate the mind,
but there is danger in its beauty.

mmlore: A shield? Best not to rely on one. After
all, no one can parry a dragon's tail
or a manticore's claws.

Studded Gauntlet.lore:
A shield? Best not to rely on one. After
all, no one can parry a dragon's tail
or a manticore's claws.

a plant put down. Mostly because
euthanasia required being a bit too
close for comfort.

Wilting Agent.lore:
The researchers were always sad to see
a plant put down. Mostly because
euthanasia required being a bit too
close for comfort.

by power incomprehensible...
<gray><key:key.attack/> while in main hand or
<gray><key:key.use/> in an inventory to open
<gray>the menu and select a song to play.

by power incomprehensible...
 while in main hand or
 in an inventory to open
the menu and select a song to play.

<gray><key:key.attack/> while in main hand or
<gray><key:key.use/> in an inventory to open
<gray>the menu and select a song to play.

The music it plays is almost magical...
 while in main hand or
 in an inventory to open
the menu and select a song to play.

mmlore: The sprawling ruins of Ta'Ferna and the
corrupted Soulbinder stand against you.
<dark_red>Completion of Shurima's Big Day Off is required
<dark_red>and end-game gear is recommended for this Strike!
<gray>This Strike requires the collection of
<gray>Souls to progress to the final boss.
<gray>Quick thinking and fast play are required.
<aqua>Players: 1-6 (One life per player)
Grants access to the Forsworn Sanctum Strike.
Forsworn Key.name: Forsworn Key
Forsworn Key.lore:
The sprawling ruins of Ta'Ferna and the
corrupted Soulbinder stand against you.
Completion of Shurima's Big Day Off is required
and end-game gear is recommended for this Strike!
This Strike requires the collection of
Souls to progress to the final boss.
Quick thinking and fast play are required.
Players: 1-6 (One life per player)
Grants access to the Forsworn Sanctum Strike.

mmlore: The time has come to enter the Inner Sanctum.
<dark_red>This Strike contains a mid-game challenge. Completion
<dark_red>of Unveiled is required and a group of 1-4 players
<dark_red>in mid-to-end game gear is recommended for this Strike.
<aqua>Players: 1-4 (Infinite attempts)
Grants access to the Inner Sanctum Story Strike.
Inner Sanctum Key.name: Inner Sanctum Key
Inner Sanctum Key.lore:
The time has come to enter the Inner Sanctum.
This Strike contains a mid-game challenge. Completion
of Unveiled is required and a group of 1-4 players
in mid-to-end game gear is recommended for this Strike.
Players: 1-4 (Infinite attempts)
Grants access to the Inner Sanctum Story Strike.

mmlore: A helm once required to access
The Sons of the Forest's Sanctum.
Mistleaf Hood.name: Mistleaf Hood
Mistleaf Hood.lore:
A helm once required to access
The Sons of the Forest's Sanctum.

mmlore: We need more trees!
Chimarian Wand.name: Chimarian Wand

mmlore: The Sanctum is empty. Kaul is gone. He no longer
replies to my calls, and the leaves within this
place have begun to wilt. My mind feels empty.
I am no longer the Soulspeaker for Kaul. I am useless.
<bold><yellow>Taking this item outside of the dungeon
<bold><yellow>will instead drop it in the dungeon.
Corrupted Key 4.name: Corrupted Key 4
Corrupted Key 4.lore:
The Sanctum is empty. Kaul is gone. He no longer
replies to my calls, and the leaves within this
place have begun to wilt. My mind feels empty.
I am no longer the Soulspeaker for Kaul. I am useless.
Taking this item outside of the dungeon
will instead drop it in the dungeon.
* DN Key 4 *

mmlore: Legends speak of a mighty power, earned
only if one kisses you below the bloom.
Sadly, nobody seems to want to.
Sprig of Mistletoe.name: Sprig of Mistletoe
Sprig of Mistletoe.lore:
Legends speak of a mighty power, earned
only if one kisses you below the bloom.
Sadly, nobody seems to want to.

mmlore: ...But even the most hidden places can
be found within the Memory.
Willowtwist Memory.name: Willowtwist Memory
Willowtwist Memory.lore:
...But even the most hidden places can
be found within the Memory.

mmlore: With every ruin of man
plants will soon take back
what was originally theirs.
Basil Leaf.name: Basil Leaf
Basil Leaf.lore:
With every ruin of man
plants will soon take back
what was originally theirs.

mmlore: How could something like this ever exist?
Truly, the world is an amazing place.
Space-bending Leaf.name: Space-bending Leaf
Space-bending Leaf.lore:
How could something like this ever exist?
Truly, the world is an amazing place.

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><light_purple>* Quest Item *
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>This is... money? I think?

#Q41I01
This is... money? I think?

mmlore: Many attempted the arduous climb, yet
you ascended the trail of temperance.
Given to those who did not abuse the Zenith
revive exploit before it was patched.
Ladder of Honesty.name: Ladder of Honesty
Ladder of Honesty.lore:
Many attempted the arduous climb, yet
you ascended the trail of temperance.
Given to those who did not abuse the Zenith
revive exploit before it was patched.

mmlore: "This place terrifies me. I knew what
I was getting into, of course, but
actually witnessing the Veil is
an experience I could never prepare
for. My light is lost. Will I too be lost?"
Fallen Lantern.name: Fallen Lantern
Fallen Lantern.lore:
"This place terrifies me. I knew what
I was getting into, of course, but
actually witnessing the Veil is
an experience I could never prepare
for. My light is lost. Will I too be lost?"

mmlore: Saia's Grace had claimed another mind,
forever imprisoned beneath the ashes
and the clay. Beneath the sands and
stones of Ishnir.
Flame of Fallen Grace.name: Flame of Fallen Grace
Flame of Fallen Grace.lore:
Saia's Grace had claimed another mind,
forever imprisoned beneath the ashes
and the clay. Beneath the sands and
stones of Ishnir.

mmlore: Encased in crystal's hold,
Moon fragment shall decree.
A Prophecy fortold,
May peaceful light guide thee.
Prophetic Moonbeam.name: Prophetic Moonbeam
Prophetic Moonbeam.lore:
Encased in crystal's hold,
Moon fragment shall decree.
A Prophecy fortold,
May peaceful light guide thee.

mmlore: The Black Mist rolls forth,
calling to unsuspecting heroes.
<dark_red>Completion of The End Chimes is required and
<dark_red>4+ players are recommended for this Strike!
<gray>This Strike requires breaking spawners
<gray>to progress to the final boss.
<aqua>Players: 1-6 (One life per player)
Grants access to The Black Mist Strike.

The Black Mist rolls forth,
calling to unsuspecting heroes.
Completion of The End Chimes is required and
4+ players are recommended for this Strike!
This Strike requires breaking spawners
to progress to the final boss.
Players: 1-6 (One life per player)
Grants access to The Black Mist Strike.

mmlore: The ability to do.
Means.name: Means

mmlore: The gem seems to flicker with the light of dying Stars...
but perhaps its radiance can be restored.
Bring to The Rionnagfaire to unlock its full potential.
Flickering Gem.name: Flickering Gem
Flickering Gem.lore:
The gem seems to flicker with the light of dying Stars...
but perhaps its radiance can be restored.
Bring to The Rionnagfaire to unlock its full potential.

mmlore: <gray>Epic Crafting Material
An especially dense crystal cluster suffused
with Harmony. The crystals resonate with a
pleasant hum, the sound of each one seeming
to blend perfectly with the others.

Harmonic Crystalline Cluster.lore:
Epic Crafting Material
An especially dense crystal cluster suffused
with Harmony. The crystals resonate with a
pleasant hum, the sound of each one seeming
to blend perfectly with the others.

mmlore: Words of power are contained within this stone.
No matter which angle you look at it from,
you can see the moon in its reflection.
This night, it shines particularly brightly.
<light_purple>* Quest Item *

Moonbound Gleamstone.lore:
Words of power are contained within this stone.
No matter which angle you look at it from,
you can see the moon in its reflection.
This night, it shines particularly brightly.
* Quest Item *
#Q205I09

mmlore: <dark_gray>A scrap of armor covered in blood. It could be

<light_purple>* Quest Item *
<dark_gray>#Q36I03

A scrap of armor covered in blood. It could be
used to trace the steps of the invaders.
* Quest Item *
#Q36I03

was essential if the Machine wished to see its

Utopia to fruition. It dared not waste even a second.

Rapid dispersal of aether in concentrated forms
was essential if the Machine wished to see its
Utopia to fruition. It dared not waste even a second.

mmlore: Power cannot be contained when it
flows like the river itself.

Power cannot be contained when it
flows like the river itself.

mmlore: The bark of the Gateway Tree didn't have

boots, with a bite.

Reality frays, help is woven.
Reality calls, power teases.

mmlore: "I've been wounded badly. My leg
grows numb and necrotic. I fear I
will be forced to cut it off if I cannot
find a way to heal it soon. I must
press on. I will not die in this place.
Not when the world depends on me
succeeding, no matter what the others on
the council think..."

I shudder at what lies below.

I shudder at what lies below.

the black ship sailed through blackest night
and aboard they cried goodbyes.
