Now as the mist grew dark and deep
and the fog grew piercing eyes,
the black ship sailed through blackest night

mmlore: Delivering gifts in the harsh Chillwind
climate requires obligatory garb.
Carved runes courtesy of academic
mages is a convenient bonus too.

Mystic Snowshoes.lore:
Delivering gifts in the harsh Chillwind
climate requires obligatory garb.
Carved runes courtesy of academic
mages is a convenient bonus too.

mmlore: Ru'Ten had failed to guard Harrakfar within the
Sanctum, a greatest shame. His power drained for
what seemed like millennia, and yet a vengeance
remained, yearning for his return.
Nature's Failure-4.name: Nature's Failure
Nature's Failure-4.lore:
Ru'Ten had failed to guard Harrakfar within the
Sanctum, a greatest shame. His power drained for
what seemed like millennia, and yet a vengeance
remained, yearning for his return.

mmlore: Whispers echo through the air,
the harrowed souls will never rest.
Night Rooster Boots.name: Night Rooster Boots
Night Rooster Boots.lore:
Whispers echo through the air,
the harrowed souls will never rest.

mmlore: Through sea and snow the stars have guided us.
In the distance, I see a gleaming visage.
The moonlight glows familiar.
Nightsky Treads.name: Nightsky Treads
Nightsky Treads.lore:
Through sea and snow the stars have guided us.
In the distance, I see a gleaming visage.
The moonlight glows familiar.

mmlore: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence,
then, is not an act, but a habit.

Peripatetic Sandals.lore:
We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence,
then, is not an act, but a habit.

mmlore: Despite the obvious signs of wear, these

"In all these things we are more than
conquerors through him that loved us."

Pilgrimage.lore:
Despite the obvious signs of wear, these
boots are clean and well maintained. Words
are stitched onto the right boot's outside:
"In all these things we are more than
conquerors through him that loved us."

through your very soul.

the cost to travel the space between.

Traces of the Void drip from the soles

mmlore: You stand on the shoulders of those
who came before you. Their experiences
now carve the path you are destined
to travel.

Sailwoven Sandals.lore:
You stand on the shoulders of those
who came before you. Their experiences
now carve the path you are destined
to travel.

mmlore: At last, their work was done. It was
then the being appeared. This would
be the last thing the scholars saw.
The Congress was overcome.

Scholar's Shoes.lore:
At last, their work was done. It was
then the being appeared. This would
be the last thing the scholars saw.
The Congress was overcome.

mmlore: Tibia honest, it's humerus that real
skeletons aren't as receptive to our
phalang-enius puns.

Tibia honest, it's humerus that real
skeletons aren't as receptive to our
phalang-enius puns.

mmlore: <dark_gray>An alternate reality skin where the
<dark_gray>Gateway Tree has been taken under
<dark_gray>Kaul's power and grown in the Blackroot
<dark_gray>Jungle instead of the Congress.

Sketched Bark of the Gateway Tree.lore:
An alternate reality skin where the
Gateway Tree has been taken under
Kaul's power and grown in the Blackroot

mmlore: "This has been a long and arduous journey...
though it is one I make out of necessity. I have
seen this sort of evil before, as well as the
the danger it presents. It must be stopped."
Snowtrodden Boots.name: Snowtrodden Boots
Snowtrodden Boots.lore:
"This has been a long and arduous journey...
though it is one I make out of necessity. I have
seen this sort of evil before, as well as the
the danger it presents. It must be stopped."

mmlore: Dripping not just with water,
but with the pain of those claimed
by Myrahg's madness.
Sodden Sandals.name: Sodden Sandals
Sodden Sandals.lore:
Dripping not just with water,
but with the pain of those claimed
by Myrahg's madness.

mmlore: She soon came to the cold realization
of the truth. Kaul was no longer in this
place. He had forsaken them all.

She soon came to the cold realization
of the truth. Kaul was no longer in this
place. He had forsaken them all.

their focus, the shoes provide an
exponential amplification of magic
when worn by a master.

Spellbinder's Slippers.lore:

their focus, the shoes provide an

mmlore: Small gusts dance around the boots.

They seem to be woven from a familiar
material. The volatility in the air
invigorates your spirit.

Something about this tunic seems
different from the rest. Words in
languages never written are carved
deep into the leather.

mmlore: <dark_gray>As Tlaxan Shamans poured magic deeper into
<dark_gray>effigies of their gods, the gods responded with
<dark_gray>blessings for the most faithful.

Swollen Scales.lore:
As Tlaxan Shamans poured magic deeper into
effigies of their gods, the gods responded with
blessings for the most faithful.

mmlore: When the last of the Blackflame died, some
found peace tending the bones.
The Decaying God.name: The Decaying God
The Decaying God.lore:
When the last of the Blackflame died, some
found peace tending the bones.

mmlore: Legends tell of a godly being that
forsook immortality in exchange for
a shell of unbreakable will.
The Godshell (chest).name: The Godshell
The Godshell (chest).lore:
Legends tell of a godly being that
forsook immortality in exchange for
a shell of unbreakable will.

mmlore: I now meet their gaze in the Veil.
<dark_gray>I now join that fraying tapestry.
No longer can I leave this ethereal realm.
Unbound Eternal Shroud.name: Unbound Eternal Shroud
Unbound Eternal Shroud.lore:
I now meet their gaze in the Veil.
I now join that fraying tapestry.
No longer can I leave this ethereal realm.

mmlore: Covered in medals and
insignias of victory.
Uniform of the Arena Champion.name: Uniform of the Arena Champion
Uniform of the Arena Champion.lore:
Covered in medals and
insignias of victory.

mmlore: The vest that once adorned the infamous
scourge of the sea.
Varcosa's Doublet.name: Varcosa's Doublet
Varcosa's Doublet.lore:
The vest that once adorned the infamous
scourge of the sea.

mmlore: What lies beyond this world must never be
disturbed. This seal shall be a lock on
the door that separates reality.
Veilguard.name: Veilguard
Veilguard.lore:
What lies beyond this world must never be
disturbed. This seal shall be a lock on
the door that separates reality.

mmlore: "When our Lady's chains fall, it will begin a new age.
One not of hidden strength, or endless seclusion,
but one of a bloody tide, overtaking all that is silver."
Verdant Dawn-2.name: Verdant Dawn
Verdant Dawn-2.lore:
"When our Lady's chains fall, it will begin a new age.
One not of hidden strength, or endless seclusion,
but one of a bloody tide, overtaking all that is silver."

so she did her best to adapt.

Wavelost Regalia-1.lore:
One ancient force of the Coven was lost to
the Deep countless years ago. Yet this faded
regalia still bears her sigil. Strange.

cloth shrouded a brilliant mind.

the Vizier waited. He would be the
next bearer, should the ritual succeed.

mmlore: They wore the Mask not only to protect
their identities, but as a symbol. Their
personal whims were irrelevant. In becoming
faceless, they took on the burden of
the world.

Blackblade Mask-2.lore:
They wore the Mask not only to protect
their identities, but as a symbol. Their
personal whims were irrelevant. In becoming
faceless, they took on the burden of
the world.

Fire at will!
Protect the ship like your life depends on it!

Cannoneer's Cap.lore:
Load the cannons!
Fire at will!
Protect the ship like your life depends on it!

mmlore: Wait, did we forget an 'e'?
Cap of Fear.name: Cap of Fear

mmlore: "These ancient woods have been defiled.
In the name of the Great Wolf, and in
the name of the All-Mother, we shall
restore the natural order!"
Cowl of the Coven-1.name: Cowl of the Coven
Cowl of the Coven-1.lore:
"These ancient woods have been defiled.
In the name of the Great Wolf, and in
the name of the All-Mother, we shall
restore the natural order!"

mmlore: Even atop the mountain's peak,
none can be seen beyond the endless
sea of permafrost.
Crest of the Tundra.name: Crest of the Tundra
Crest of the Tundra.lore:
Even atop the mountain's peak,
none can be seen beyond the endless
sea of permafrost.

mmlore: Soft to the touch, yet you feel
a strong presence in this helm.
Crown of the Forbidden Yew.name: Crown of the Forbidden Yew
Crown of the Forbidden Yew.lore:
Soft to the touch, yet you feel
a strong presence in this helm.

mmlore: <dark_gray>I am a key when you have discovered my color.
<dark_gray>Then bring me to the Knight...
Cryptic Breaker.name: Cryptic Breaker
Cryptic Breaker.lore:
I am a key when you have discovered my color.
Then bring me to the Knight...

mmlore: With the tide comes the Admiral, the
bearer of the glorious end.
Dread Admiral's Hat.name: Dread Admiral's Hat
Dread Admiral's Hat.lore:
With the tide comes the Admiral, the
bearer of the glorious end.

mmlore: The waves do not remember, but the beasts
below will never forget.
Elder Scales.name: Elder Scales
Elder Scales.lore:
The waves do not remember, but the beasts
below will never forget.

mmlore: He was born a ruler. From his first
cry to his last gasp, the Emperor held
power firmly in his fist.
Emperor's Hood.name: Emperor's Hood
Emperor's Hood.lore:
He was born a ruler. From his first
cry to his last gasp, the Emperor held
power firmly in his fist.

mmlore: Time after time the Silvari struck
against the Fen. Time after time
they were repelled.
Eternal Resolve-1.name: Eternal Resolve
Eternal Resolve-1.lore:
Time after time the Silvari struck
against the Fen. Time after time
they were repelled.

<bold><yellow>will instead drop it in the dungeon.
Explorer's Hat.name: Explorer's Hat
Explorer's Hat.lore:
Taking this item outside of the dungeon
will instead drop it in the dungeon.

mmlore: The fabric is fragile and tears at the touch,
but longs to remember a day when it was strong,
and so it reforms anew.
Fading Echo.name: Fading Echo
Fading Echo.lore:
The fabric is fragile and tears at the touch,
but longs to remember a day when it was strong,
and so it reforms anew.

mmlore: The Bastille pierced the Wolfswood's tranquility
like a dagger through the heart. The Great Wolf fell,
and a lifeless night took of all who lived under him.
Falling Blades-2.name: Falling Blades
Falling Blades-2.lore:
The Bastille pierced the Wolfswood's tranquility
like a dagger through the heart. The Great Wolf fell,
and a lifeless night took of all who lived under him.

mmlore: Nice guys finish last... M'lady
Fedora.name: Fedora

mmlore: Nothing will be wrong.
Grasses.name: Grasses

mmlore: Every age, it seems, is tainted by
the greed of men.
Helmet of Greed.name: Helmet of Greed
Helmet of Greed.lore:
Every age, it seems, is tainted by
the greed of men.

mmlore: <dark_gray>As the final seal broke, the Book's maw
<dark_gray>opened wide. The whisper grew. You feel a
<dark_gray>power overwhelming you, calling you to place
<dark_gray>it on your head, so it may feast and you may learn.
Incredibly Harmful Tome.name: Incredibly Harmful Tome
Incredibly Harmful Tome.lore:
As the final seal broke, the Book's maw
opened wide. The whisper grew. You feel a
power overwhelming you, calling you to place
it on your head, so it may feast and you may learn.

mmlore: It offers protection from the rains
of Spring and the rays of Summer.
In that space between you must sow
the seeds of Harmony.
Invigorating Paddy Hat.name: Invigorating Paddy Hat
Invigorating Paddy Hat.lore:
It offers protection from the rains
of Spring and the rays of Summer.
In that space between you must sow
the seeds of Harmony.

mmlore: Let all strikes miss, for this
crown guards your fate.
Kismet's Blessing.name: Kismet's Blessing
Kismet's Blessing.lore:
Let all strikes miss, for this
crown guards your fate.

mmlore: Belonged to a bright young pirate, whose
spirit has since been crushed.
Levyn's Pirate Hat.name: Levyn's Pirate Hat
Levyn's Pirate Hat.lore:
Belonged to a bright young pirate, whose
spirit has since been crushed.

mmlore: You feel the wind turn.
A chill hangs on the breeze.
It is time to reap the fruits of Harmony.
Mask of the Harvest.name: Mask of the Harvest
Mask of the Harvest.lore:
You feel the wind turn.
A chill hangs on the breeze.
It is time to reap the fruits of Harmony.

mmlore: Is it to stop the miasma, or to hide
the festering flesh beneath?
Mask of the Sealed.name: Mask of the Sealed
Mask of the Sealed.lore:
Is it to stop the miasma, or to hide
the festering flesh beneath?

mmlore: Screams echoed throughout Nightroost -
they seemingly came from the sky itself.
Night Rooster Hood.name: Night Rooster Hood
Night Rooster Hood.lore:
Screams echoed throughout Nightroost -
they seemingly came from the sky itself.

mmlore: As long as Cazol held Kaul bound, the
Loci could never find the Sons. His fury
would be theirs to control.
Nightleaf Visage.name: Nightleaf Visage
Nightleaf Visage.lore:
As long as Cazol held Kaul bound, the
Loci could never find the Sons. His fury
would be theirs to control.

mmlore: A prisoner to one's knowledge is
a fate worse than death.
Obsidian Skin.name: Obsidian Skin
Obsidian Skin.lore:
A prisoner to one's knowledge is
a fate worse than death.

mmlore: Ancient horns adorn your visage.
Ancient jaws command your voice.
Osseous Mask.name: Osseous Mask
Osseous Mask.lore:
Ancient horns adorn your visage.
Ancient jaws command your voice.

mmlore: Rivers of fire beget rivers of blood -
to bear witness to these cursed visions
must drive the sane to madness.
Phlegethon Visage.name: Phlegethon Visage
Phlegethon Visage.lore:
Rivers of fire beget rivers of blood -
to bear witness to these cursed visions
must drive the sane to madness.

mmlore: I am the darkness behind your eyes.
Reaper's Hood.name: Reaper's Hood
Reaper's Hood.lore: I am the darkness behind your eyes.

mmlore: A cap belonging to one of two scout corporals
sent to spy on the Southern Jaguar Village.
The tattered ribbons of fabric and flecks of
blood allude to an untimely demise.
Sergeant Sigrun will certainly want to know
about the fates of both men.
<light_purple>* Quest Item *
Redmond's Cap.name: Redmond's Cap
Redmond's Cap.lore:
A cap belonging to one of two scout corporals
sent to spy on the Southern Jaguar Village.
The tattered ribbons of fabric and flecks of
blood allude to an untimely demise.
Sergeant Sigrun will certainly want to know
about the fates of both men.
* Quest Item *
#Q06I02

and now the Dichen threat. When surrounded
by such pests, one has no choice but
bloodshed.

Resilient Growth-1.lore:
Plagued first by Silver, then Silvari,
and now the Dichen threat. When surrounded
by such pests, one has no choice but
bloodshed.

mmlore: Let's hope you don't end up
like this poor fellow.

Sacrifice's Scalp.lore:
Let's hope you don't end up
like this poor fellow.

mmlore: Woven from the echoes of betrayal, this
hood reliably protects the wearer from
blood, absorbing it and purifying it
into its original form - mana.
Sanguine Hood-2.name: Sanguine Hood
Sanguine Hood-2.lore:
Woven from the echoes of betrayal, this
hood reliably protects the wearer from
blood, absorbing it and purifying it
into its original form - mana.

hood reliably protects the wearer from
blood, absorbing it and purifying it
into its original form - mana.

mmlore: There were few things that could bring
the rival Kingdoms of Ishnir and Chillwind
together, but the goal of the Congress
was enough.
Scholar's Hood.name: Scholar's Hood
Scholar's Hood.lore:
There were few things that could bring
the rival Kingdoms of Ishnir and Chillwind
together, but the goal of the Congress
was enough.

mmlore: The material of the helmet is completely
waterlogged, fading away the words
Ka'Aqu stamped within.
Seasoaked Helmet.name: Seasoaked Helmet
Seasoaked Helmet.lore:
The material of the helmet is completely
waterlogged, fading away the words
Ka'Aqu stamped within.

mmlore: Eyes shut. Strange figures sway in the darkness.
Their presence was. Wrong. Inconceivable.
Had they been here all along?
Sedated Shadows-4.name: Sedated Shadows
Sedated Shadows-4.lore:
Eyes shut. Strange figures sway in the darkness.
Their presence was. Wrong. Inconceivable.
Had they been here all along?

mmlore: A pair of silver goggles, they
gleam in the light.
Silvered Sight.name: Silvered Sight
Silvered Sight.lore:
A pair of silver goggles, they
gleam in the light.

mmlore: Silver remembers the past more than any other metal.
The spiders know this better than most.
Silversilk Visage.name: Silversilk Visage
Silversilk Visage.lore:
Silver remembers the past more than any other metal.
The spiders know this better than most.

mmlore: Here too, whispers from Above have shown
themselves. Be it by stars or by moon,
the sky must still shatter.
Stargazer's Wrap.name: Stargazer's Wrap
Stargazer's Wrap.lore:
Here too, whispers from Above have shown
themselves. Be it by stars or by moon,
the sky must still shatter.

mmlore: Those who built these halls watch over you.
Let their souls guide your careful eyes...
Stonegazer Eyes.name: Stonegazer Eyes
Stonegazer Eyes.lore:
Those who built these halls watch over you.
Let their souls guide your careful eyes...

mmlore: Svalgot's eyes seek beyond what
can be seen naturally. The Void
guides his sight now.
Svalgot's Leer.name: Svalgot's Leer
Svalgot's Leer.lore:
Svalgot's eyes seek beyond what
can be seen naturally. The Void
guides his sight now.

mmlore: Begrudgingly, they made a pact.
Only death could separate them now.
Timeless Bond.name: Timeless Bond
Timeless Bond.lore:
Begrudgingly, they made a pact.
Only death could separate them now.

mmlore: The wind blows with purpose over the docks
of Port Manteau. The echoes of ruin are
muted by the bustle of trade.

lamenting a loss felt by all.

The vines hang somber over Ta'Ferna,
lamenting a loss felt by all.

mmlore: Brisk and Lively.
Vivac.name: Vivac

mmlore: Prep the deck and raise the sails
A new day rises, adventure hails.
Waverider's Cap.name: Waverider's Cap
Waverider's Cap.lore:
Prep the deck and raise the sails
A new day rises, adventure hails.

mmlore: Belonged to a bright young pirate
who has been crushed.
Xeno's Pirate Hat.name: Xeno's Pirate Hat
Xeno's Pirate Hat.lore:
Belonged to a bright young pirate
who has been crushed.

mmlore: It was only when the people of
the empire, whom he had so
greatly loved, were endangered,
that Almon finally began to act.
He quarreled with Pelias for years,
but nothing came of it. Until that final day.
<bold><yellow>Taking this item outside of the dungeon
<bold><yellow>will instead drop it in the dungeon.
Almon's Severed Leg.name: Almon's Severed Leg
Almon's Severed Leg.lore:
It was only when the people of
the empire, whom he had so
greatly loved, were endangered,
that Almon finally began to act.
He quarreled with Pelias for years,
but nothing came of it. Until that final day.
Taking this item outside of the dungeon
will instead drop it in the dungeon.

mmlore: The outer layer of these strange greaves
have crystallized. Tougher than most metals...
Yet like the stars, majestic and graceful.
Ad Astra.name: Ad Astra
Ad Astra.lore:
The outer layer of these strange greaves
have crystallized. Tougher than most metals...
Yet like the stars, majestic and graceful.

mmlore: Harden thy form, and slow thy movement.
Only then shall you become one with
the tortoise.
Ammi's Embrace.name: Ammi's Embrace
Ammi's Embrace.lore:
Harden thy form, and slow thy movement.
Only then shall you become one with
the tortoise.

mmlore: Flecks of blood stain these ancient
sacrificial robes.
Ancient Robes.name: Ancient Robes
Ancient Robes.lore:
Flecks of blood stain these ancient
sacrificial robes.

mmlore: The water flowing through these greaves
is reminiscent of the ancient aqueducts
within the city.
Aqueduct Greaves.name: Aqueduct Greaves
Aqueduct Greaves.lore:
The water flowing through these greaves
is reminiscent of the ancient aqueducts
within the city.

mmlore: When one's enemy is the Council,
one learns to be discreet.
Aradian Secrecy-1.name: Aradian Secrecy

When one's enemy is the Council,
one learns to be discreet.

but reality is not always what it seems at first glance.

do these beastmen hold?

Boomwoven Vines.lore:
To skin a creeper... what power
do these beastmen hold?

mmlore: A cold wind blows out of the cavern's
arcane pools. From the Monastery, a careful
eye watches the breeze.

Boreas Greaves.lore:
A cold wind blows out of the cavern's
arcane pools. From the Monastery, a careful
eye watches the breeze.

mmlore: Caution: Highly Combustible!
Busty's Hot Pants.name: Busty's Hot Pants

mmlore: We are not trapped here with those Argone scum.
Rather, they are trapped in here with us.
Cloak of the Bastion.name: Cloak of the Bastion
Cloak of the Bastion.lore:
We are not trapped here with those Argone scum.
Rather, they are trapped in here with us.

mmlore: Scalding steam rises from these robes,
a reminder of what is to come.
Corrupted Water Robe.name: Corrupted Water Robe
Corrupted Water Robe.lore:
Scalding steam rises from these robes,
a reminder of what is to come.

mmlore: Found on the bottom floor.
Deepveil Shadows.name: Deepveil Shadows

mmlore: The Crimson King traveled far after his birth.
What he found in the world proved his cause.
Desert Explorer.name: Desert Explorer
Desert Explorer.lore:
The Crimson King traveled far after his birth.
What he found in the world proved his cause.

mmlore: A simple garment, attuned with the
strength of the Jungle itself.
Earthbound Pants.name: Earthbound Pants
Earthbound Pants.lore:
A simple garment, attuned with the
strength of the Jungle itself.

mmlore: There were others from those shores.
He thought them invaders. They cared
not for Isharist. They only wanted to
recapture what was theirs.
Emperor's Robes (legs).name: Emperor's Robes
Emperor's Robes (legs).lore:
There were others from those shores.
He thought them invaders. They cared
not for Isharist. They only wanted to
recapture what was theirs.

mmlore: The walls of pure darkness close in.
Your breath, shaken with trepidation.
Only one mind can claim triumph here.
Encroaching Dark-4.name: Encroaching Dark
Encroaching Dark-4.lore:
The walls of pure darkness close in.
Your breath, shaken with trepidation.
Only one mind can claim triumph here.

mmlore: At the end, Eomen stood with his arms
wide, ready to embrace the magic sweeping
through the Forum. This was new ground
to break.
Eomen's Robes.name: Eomen's Robes
Eomen's Robes.lore:
At the end, Eomen stood with his arms
wide, ready to embrace the magic sweeping
through the Forum. This was new ground
to break.

mmlore: The ripples in the cloth flow endlessly.
You feel yourself sinking into an infinite fervor.

Fervorous Robes.lore:
The ripples in the cloth flow endlessly.
You feel yourself sinking into an infinite fervor.

mmlore: Forged with the sweetest Gems.

the pelt bears a distinctly foreign style.
Wearing it, you feel unstoppable.

the pelt bears a distinctly foreign style.
Wearing it, you feel unstoppable.

As Kaul's power consumed Hellshire,
he found himself reborn within
flames eternal.

Those whipping winds of winter shall extinguish all.
Only a warrior's will persists in the blizzard.

to sacrifice anything for their God.

were even more embroiled with

one goal, and these beasts would
not stop him.

The haunting screams of the Lunatics
fell on deaf ears. C'Zanil had only
one goal, and these beasts would
not stop him.

from the quiet coast-dwellers who once occupied
the lands of Port Manteau. The Silvari colonists
twisted the ancient practice into a tool for war.

Razorleaf Breeches-2.lore:
The Dichen inherited the art of leaf weaving
from the quiet coast-dwellers who once occupied

mmlore: The chill that makes blood run cold.
Reaper's Robes.name: Reaper's Robes
Reaper's Robes.lore: The chill that makes blood run cold.

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>It is said that starshine grants
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>a long, fulfilling life.
Replica Starshine Pants.name: Replica Starshine Pants
Replica Starshine Pants.lore:
It is said that starshine grants
a long, fulfilling life.

mmlore: While the Vesuvian magma stopped
flowing, the memory of it will
live on forever.
Robes of the Core.name: Robes of the Core
Robes of the Core.lore:
While the Vesuvian magma stopped
flowing, the memory of it will
live on forever.

mmlore: Legend speaks of a blinding light, flashing in
the skies above the Blackroot. Only when the
Jungle chooses, does sunshine bless its leaves.
Robes of the Secret Sun.name: Robes of the Secret Sun
Robes of the Secret Sun.lore:
Legend speaks of a blinding light, flashing in
the skies above the Blackroot. Only when the
Jungle chooses, does sunshine bless its leaves.

mmlore: I can't help but feel these should be light
blue... it's written in fate.
Runeweave Leggings.name: Runeweave Leggings
Runeweave Leggings.lore:
I can't help but feel these should be light
blue... it's written in fate.

mmlore: Mauta's blessing be upon the rolling dunes
of Ishnir. From the mesa above to the canyons
below, the warmth of the Goddess is felt
by all her creatures.
Sands of Ishnir.name: Sands of Ishnir
Sands of Ishnir.lore:
Mauta's blessing be upon the rolling dunes
of Ishnir. From the mesa above to the canyons
below, the warmth of the Goddess is felt
by all her creatures.

mmlore: Their plans were progressing rapidly
and success was near. Surely nothing
could stop them now.
Scholar's Robes (legs).name: Scholar's Robes
Scholar's Robes (legs).lore:
Their plans were progressing rapidly
and success was near. Surely nothing
could stop them now.

mmlore: Yarr, ye got yer sea legs now!
Sea Legs.name: Sea Legs
Sea Legs.lore: Yarr, ye got yer sea legs now!

mmlore: The lost souls swirling in these waters
are familiar. They too were tempted
by those beyond the Veil.
Seeker's Pursuit.name: Seeker's Pursuit
Seeker's Pursuit.lore:
The lost souls swirling in these waters
are familiar. They too were tempted
by those beyond the Veil.

mmlore: We will remember them,
we who are left.
Serpensia Wrap.name: Serpensia Wrap
Serpensia Wrap.lore:
We will remember them,
we who are left.

mmlore: There were no funerals for the lost
Silvari, for there were no bodies to
entomb. The shades were all that remained
of that doomed people.

Shroud of the Disappeared-1.lore:
There were no funerals for the lost
Silvari, for there were no bodies to
entomb. The shades were all that remained
of that doomed people.

the doors closed.

isolationism, mimicked in their warrior garb.

leave his chamber...

mmlore: Grants access to dungeon:
<#8b0000>Ephemeral Corridors
In <#8b0000>Endless Mode</#8b0000> there is a time limit. Up
to 3 players can enter the dungeon instance.
Upon death or running out of time, you are
ejected from the dungeon (<#d02e28>Keep Inventory</#d02e28>)
and granted rewards based on your treasure
score within the dungeon. After completion
of Floor Three, at the start of each floor
randomized delve modifiers are added to
your instance.
<#47b6b5>1 Player:</#47b6b5> 30 Minutes per Floor
<#47b6b5>2 Players:</#47b6b5> 17 Minutes per Floor
<#47b6b5>3 Players:</#47b6b5> 12 Minutes per Floor

Rewards are only granted upon completion.

mmlore: Ka'Vei'Lok was sealed by invocation of the mighty
Source of All Things, and the construction of the
four holy temples. A conspicuous way of hiding such
a terrible power. The second great discovery of
the veil-obsessed shamans was hidden away much
more subtly, left to simply be forgotten.
The Narsens' decision to erect their capital
on top of the forsaken vault certainly helped.
The Blind Eye, however, sees the forgotten
even clearer than the remembered.
Sealing Keystone.name: Sealing Keystone
Sealing Keystone.lore:
Ka'Vei'Lok was sealed by invocation of the mighty
Source of All Things, and the construction of the
four holy temples. A conspicuous way of hiding such
a terrible power. The second great discovery of
the veil-obsessed shamans was hidden away much
more subtly, left to simply be forgotten.
The Narsens' decision to erect their capital
on top of the forsaken vault certainly helped.

The Blind Eye, however, sees the forgotten
even clearer than the remembered.

<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>The rooster crows at midnight.

mmlore: <dark_gray>Daarken plucked the wool from the limp corpse
<dark_gray>of the former Emperor, whose crimes had
<dark_gray>at last been paid for - the razing of his
<dark_gray>mighty empire. Once Crimson's pair was
<dark_gray>found, Daarken would leave this mess to the
<dark_gray>Giants. For now, a new resting place would
<dark_gray>be necessary. The Monument must be reformed
<dark_gray>in that primordial jungle of spirits...
<dark_gray>Perhaps he would rest there too...
Replica Crimson Wool.name: Replica Crimson Wool
Replica Crimson Wool.lore:
Daarken plucked the wool from the limp corpse
of the former Emperor, whose crimes had
at last been paid for - the razing of his
mighty empire. Once Crimson's pair was
found, Daarken would leave this mess to the
Giants. For now, a new resting place would
be necessary. The Monument must be reformed
in that primordial jungle of spirits...
Perhaps he would rest there too...

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>As Salazar's imbalance rippled through
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>the wool, he saw a vision of a world
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>far separated from his own. A fragment
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>of Void long since frayed from the Veil.
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>A realm of pure dissonance.
Replica Lilac Wool.name: Replica Lilac Wool
Replica Lilac Wool.lore:
As Salazar's imbalance rippled through
the wool, he saw a vision of a world
far separated from his own. A fragment
of Void long since frayed from the Veil.
A realm of pure dissonance.

mmlore: Vaessini and Orasomn. Crimson and Teal.
Tied together through more than time and
memories. Without Vaessini's surrender,
the Architect could never have overseen
Orasomn's capture. Without Orasomn's
freedom, Vaessini could never have found
his Home again. Now one will hold the other
in eternal vigil.
Replica Malefactor and Manumitted.name: Replica Malefactor and Manumitted
Replica Malefactor and Manumitted.lore:
Vaessini and Orasomn. Crimson and Teal.
Tied together through more than time and
memories. Without Vaessini's surrender,
the Architect could never have overseen
Orasomn's capture. Without Orasomn's
freedom, Vaessini could never have found
his Home again. Now one will hold the other
in eternal vigil.

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>It seeks a cageless world to roam
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>For silver does malign.
Replica Olive Wool.name: Replica Olive Wool
Replica Olive Wool.lore:
It seeks a cageless world to roam
For silver does malign.

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>As his spawn made contact with the
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>wool, he saw visions of the world across
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>the newly formed rift. Ymmodae had
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>finally found a potential way in.
Replica Rose Wool.name: Replica Rose Wool
Replica Rose Wool.lore:
As his spawn made contact with the
wool, he saw visions of the world across
the newly formed rift. Ymmodae had
finally found a potential way in.

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>And with that, our hero learned a very valuable
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>lesson. Don't accept drinks from strangers
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>and hallucinate about a Wool that never existed.
<!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>(But if it did exist, its aspect would totally be Festivity.)
Replica Snow Wool.name: Replica Snow Wool
Replica Snow Wool.lore:
And with that, our hero learned a very valuable
lesson. Don't accept drinks from strangers
and hallucinate about a Wool that never existed.
(But if it did exist, its aspect would totally be Festivity.)

mmlore: <!italic><!underlined><!strikethrough><!bold><!obfuscated><dark_gray>Forward now, thy fate shall write;

mmlore: "There's nothing easier than hexing
a fish in a barrel." - A saying that's
spread around the Coven of the Ring
for generations. It's not actually true
though, as it's notoriously difficult to
hex a fish you can't see. Such tough coven
teachings leave many scars of battle on
the poor barrels of the Wolfswood.

just discovered. The spell had to be mine, alone."

this way, hanging over a gaping eternity.

He could breathe their air.
He could destroy their greatest treasure.

mmlore: Iota scoured her data banks, seeking
the source of the corruption that
had taken her mind and freedom from
her. It seemed to have left no trace,
until she noticed a small, seemingly
negligible blip of energy within her.
It whispered in an inaudible tone, the
words incomprehensible. But... it was
almost as if she could make out the
repeated use of "Neo"...

mmlore: The Pot of Proportions is deceptive in dimension;
Compact in appearance, but with enchanted extension!
Your toys and your trinkets remain in the mixture;
No damage is done to their talent or texture!
<gray>Right Click while in inventory to spot in the pot.
<gray>But carry coins on the cursor, and they join the lot.
<gray>Press <key:key.swapOffhand> to store all the gold that you hold.
Sketched Bag of Hoarding.name: Sketched Bag of Hoarding
Sketched Bag of Hoarding.lore:
The Pot of Proportions is deceptive in dimension;
Compact in appearance, but with enchanted extension!
Your toys and your trinkets remain in the mixture;
No damage is done to their talent or texture!
Right Click while in inventory to spot in the pot.
But carry coins on the cursor, and they join the lot.
Press  to store all the gold that you hold.

<dark_gray>now push toward greater discoveries.

should have been forgotten.

Even a single whiff of the liquid inside will
unleash a deluge of memories that
should have been forgotten.

you from the deadly plague within.

A black ooze bubbles and churms within the
tinted glass. A simple cork is all that separates
you from the deadly plague within.

mmlore: Persevere. It is the duty of the Ashkii.
Potion of Perseverance.name: Potion of Perseverance
Potion of Perseverance.lore: Persevere. It is the duty of the Ashkii.

mmlore: As a preventative measure, the Narsens
occasionally use these limited issue vials on
their infantry before engaging with the enemy.

Potion of Protection.lore:
As a preventative measure, the Narsens
occasionally use these limited issue vials on
their infantry before engaging with the enemy.

mmlore: Despite the Empire's claimed aversion
to magic, most healers choose the
pragmatic solution when time is short.

Potion of Redemption.lore:
Despite the Empire's claimed aversion
to magic, most healers choose the
pragmatic solution when time is short.

to be unleashed.

your conquest has already occurred.

dazzle with temporal magic. Sprinkling the
dust sends you into a future where
your conquest has already occurred.

Infernal Katar.lore:

once more. A world scorched, a blade found.

mmlore: The intricate crafting has been
severely worn by ages of decay
within the Veil. It would take someone
exceptionally knowledgeable in its
design in order to repair it.

Irrus' Brace.lore:
The intricate crafting has been
severely worn by ages of decay
within the Veil. It would take someone
exceptionally knowledgeable in its
design in order to repair it.

mmlore: With the war came betrayal.
With betrayal came the fury.
Jungle's Vengeance.name: Jungle's Vengeance
Jungle's Vengeance.lore:
With the war came betrayal.
With betrayal came the fury.

mmlore: A shortsword belonging to Sergeant Kim, who was
sent to spy on the Northern Jaguar Village.
In its current condition, the blade is
no better than a blunt instrument.
Sergeant Sigrun will certainly want to know
about her fate.
<light_purple>* Quest Item *
Kim's Sword.name: Kim's Sword
Kim's Sword.lore:
A shortsword belonging to Sergeant Kim, who was
sent to spy on the Northern Jaguar Village.
In its current condition, the blade is
no better than a blunt instrument.
Sergeant Sigrun will certainly want to know
about her fate.
* Quest Item *
#Q06I03

mmlore: All the offerings in the world could
not placate Kaul's rage as he discovered
what C'Axtal had done.
Loci Offering.name: Loci Offering
Loci Offering.lore:
All the offerings in the world could
not placate Kaul's rage as he discovered
what C'Axtal had done.

mmlore: The crystalline structure of the blade reflects
all, whether it be the corpse of an enemy
or the eye of its wielder.

Lustrous Edge.lore:
The crystalline structure of the blade reflects
all, whether it be the corpse of an enemy
or the eye of its wielder.

mmlore: Once enshrined in the Frostgate crypts,
the Frost Moon recovered the blade.
A new Prophet must be protected in the
same manner as the Old.
Moon's Judgment.name: Moon's Judgment
Moon's Judgment.lore:
Once enshrined in the Frostgate crypts,
the Frost Moon recovered the blade.
A new Prophet must be protected in the
same manner as the Old.

mmlore: Under the glow of the full moon the
Night's Messenger walks again.

Moon's Shadow.lore:
Under the glow of the full moon the
Night's Messenger walks again.

mmlore: There will always be retaliation from
the Messenger of the Night.
Night's Shadow.name: Night's Shadow
Night's Shadow.lore:
There will always be retaliation from
the Messenger of the Night.

mmlore: Indigo remained hidden, obfuscated by the
seemingly infinite rifts to other spaces.
But soon enough, it would be found.
Aurora would have her way.
Nihilistic Convergence-3.name: Nihilistic Convergence
Nihilistic Convergence-3.lore:
Indigo remained hidden, obfuscated by the
seemingly infinite rifts to other spaces.
But soon enough, it would be found.
Aurora would have her way.

hums with vibrant energy. Its hilt
is inscribed with the name "Noren".

hums with vibrant energy. Its hilt
is inscribed with the name "Noren".

mmlore: Blind faith eclipsed the pleas for a quiet life.
In the end, a bright star has faded far
beyond this realm, while another star
is preparing to light up the firmament.
Ophion.name: Ophion
Ophion.lore:
Blind faith eclipsed the pleas for a quiet life.
In the end, a bright star has faded far
beyond this realm, while another star
is preparing to light up the firmament.

mmlore: Time passes; the shadows loom.
Passing Shadows.name: Passing Shadows

creating power from nature.

Poison Ivy.lore:
Vines grow rapidly along the blade,
creating power from nature.

distorting the light around it. What
else could this magic hide?

Prismatic Blade.lore:

distorting the light around it. What
else could this magic hide?

The soul of the jungle.

Purified Claw.lore:

The soul of the jungle.

mmlore: Everything will fade one day. But
don't worry friend - from nothing,
flowers will bloom again.

Rinascita.lore:
Everything will fade one day. But
don't worry friend - from nothing,
flowers will bloom again.

solid earth! The actual world!

Rootstrike.lore:
Rocks, trees, wind on our cheeks! The
solid earth! The actual world!

mmlore: And within the corridors, the
true power is awoken.
Rosethorn Blade.name: Rosethorn Blade
Rosethorn Blade.lore:
And within the corridors, the
true power is awoken.

mmlore: A standard-issue weapon used by some
foreign soldiers to help parry incoming
attacks. In some situations however, this
weapon can prove formidable in combat.

Rusted Soldier's Sai.lore:
A standard-issue weapon used by some
foreign soldiers to help parry incoming
attacks. In some situations however, this
weapon can prove formidable in combat.

The Tlaxans will follow.

Sacrificial Dagger.lore:
The first to fall will be C'Shura.
The Tlaxans will follow.

jungle by the elders within Ta'Ksaav.

Sanctified Dagger.lore:
Imparted with the blessings of the
jungle by the elders within Ta'Ksaav.

<dark_gray>appendages from those they defeated onto
<dark_gray>themselves. Trophies? Weapons?

Scoundrel's Appendage-3.lore:

appendages from those they defeated onto
themselves. Trophies? Weapons?

Scoundrel's Appendage-4.lore:

Seasoaked Runeblade.lore:
A relic of the Eastern Swamplands. The blade

mmlore: <dark_gray>While Cascade brings to mind the flow
<dark_gray>of a river, what could it be if frozen?
<dark_gray>Perhaps we could call it "Frostbite"?
Sketched Cascade.name: Sketched Cascade
Sketched Cascade.lore:
While Cascade brings to mind the flow
of a river, what could it be if frozen?
Perhaps we could call it "Frostbite"?

mmlore: Suddenly, a path was opened by the blade. From
a shimmering crack, the Tuathan stepped into
the shrine. Cherry blossoms dotted the garden.
The anguish of a million voices was now balanced
by the soft sound of peace.

Sketched Harmony's End.lore:
Suddenly, a path was opened by the blade. From
a shimmering crack, the Tuathan stepped into
the shrine. Cherry blossoms dotted the garden.
The anguish of a million voices was now balanced
by the soft sound of peace.

Stormborn Runeblade.lore:
A relic of the Central Plateau. It
seems to spark in your palms.

into the future.

mmlore: An incident like with Teal could not be
allowed to occur again. Clearly, Calder
thought, there are things unknown to
the scribes of history. Secrets within
secrets that have been scrubbed
from the world's eye. The imprisoned
ones are more than proof of this.
But he must persist regardless, as
nothing can truly be indestructible.
Whatever method it may take to rid the
world of them, he will find it.

thought, there are things unknown to
the scribes of history. Secrets within
secrets that have been scrubbed
from the world's eye. The imprisoned
ones are more than proof of this.
But he must persist regardless, as
nothing can truly be indestructible.
Whatever method it may take to rid the
world of them, he will find it.

a god that had gone unknown to them.

his blessings, Kaul woke. Ta'Ferna
would burn for this sin.

mmlore: As the stranger progressed through
the temple, reaching its inner most
depths, Varcosa's soul could feel the
shackles that had long binded him fall
away. Had it been done? Had someone
truly claimed The Corsair, tearing it
from the anchor that gave it dominion
here? The time had come for him to
leave. He must scour the Veil and find
his crew. They needed their captain.
Piece of Hate.name: Piece of Hate
Piece of Hate.lore:
As the stranger progressed through
the temple, reaching its inner most
depths, Varcosa's soul could feel the
shackles that had long binded him fall
away. Had it been done? Had someone
truly claimed The Corsair, tearing it
from the anchor that gave it dominion
here? The time had come for him to
leave. He must scour the Veil and find
his crew. They needed their captain.

mmlore: Currency from the long forgotten
empire of Viridia. Likely not worth much now.
Viridian Den.name: Viridian Den
Viridian Den.lore:
Currency from the long forgotten
empire of Viridia. Likely not worth much now.

mmlore: <!italic><dark_gray>Once, it was tossed into the
<!italic><dark_gray>depths for luck. Now, perhaps
<!italic><dark_gray>it can be used for something
<!italic><dark_gray>more...
Whirlpool Coin.name: Whirlpool Coin
Whirlpool Coin.lore:
Once, it was tossed into the
depths for luck. Now, perhaps
it can be used for something
more...

spices and fresh fish. Delightfully tasty

gonna let it shine...

This little light of mine, I'm
gonna let it shine...

twisted by those sealed within the Temple.

twisted by those sealed within the Temple.

mmlore: Now I stand, the guardian of Kaul's rage.
No longer can I protect my people. I only
can protect the Jungle.

Ixchtek of C'Axtal.lore:
Now I stand, the guardian of Kaul's rage.
No longer can I protect my people. I only
can protect the Jungle.

mmlore: From clay, you were forged.
From the ashes, you rise anew.
Necromancer's Sigil.name: Necromancer's Sigil
Necromancer's Sigil.lore:
From clay, you were forged.
From the ashes, you rise anew.

mmlore: A giant's knowledge, and a man named
Chris. With this, your pain relieved.
<gray>Consuming this item will allow the Perfect
<gray>Crystallizer to convert Uncommons into
<gray>regional and circus/carnival currencies.
<gray>Consumed by left clicking in mainhand.
<red>Consuming this item cannot be undone!

A giant's knowledge, and a man named
Chris. With this, your pain relieved.

regional and circus/carnival currencies.
Consumed by left clicking in mainhand.
Consuming this item cannot be undone!

we worshipped not a man,

in the deepest trenches.

in the deepest trenches.

"Don't worry, nothing in the ocean would
stand a chance against this."

blood as a pirate is for gold.

A gleaming polearm, as hungry for
blood as a pirate is for gold.

Highwatch Pike.lore:

mmlore: A mythical relic of the sea.

faces, and even fate.

mmlore: Its brilliant starlight shines forth
to guide foes to their destiny.
Pole Star.name: Pole Star
Pole Star.lore:
Its brilliant starlight shines forth
to guide foes to their destiny.

mmlore: Fire is not the enemy of the Jungle.
It cleanses... purifies corruption.
Pyreborne Spear.name: Pyreborne Spear
Pyreborne Spear.lore:
Fire is not the enemy of the Jungle.
It cleanses... purifies corruption.

mmlore: <dark_gray>From nothing came colors to light the way.
<dark_gray>Too soon the path would be lost...
Replica Ex Nihilo.name: Replica Ex Nihilo
Replica Ex Nihilo.lore:
From nothing came colors to light the way.
Too soon the path would be lost...

mmlore: Like the stirring of the elements, power
<dark_gray>rushes to our side.
Replica Vedha's Broomstick.name: Replica Vedha's Broomstick
Replica Vedha's Broomstick.lore:
Like the stirring of the elements, power
rushes to our side.

mmlore: <dark_gray>Lightbringer's beauty, corrupted deeply
<dark_gray>by Azacor's fateful wounds. Perhaps now
<dark_gray>he still uses it to cause pain.
Sketched Lightbringer.name: Sketched Lightbringer
Sketched Lightbringer.lore:
Lightbringer's beauty, corrupted deeply
by Azacor's fateful wounds. Perhaps now
he still uses it to cause pain.

mmlore: Deep beneath the permafrost, the Herald spread
its sickly blight across all it touched. Eventually,
a visitor arrived. With a surge of power
and a shard in hand, he gained a new title.
Alric, Lord of the Chilled Winds and
first of the Stargazers.
Sketched Titan Spear.name: Sketched Titan Spear
Sketched Titan Spear.lore:
Deep beneath the permafrost, the Herald spread
its sickly blight across all it touched. Eventually,
a visitor arrived. With a surge of power
and a shard in hand, he gained a new title.
Alric, Lord of the Chilled Winds and
first of the Stargazers.

mmlore: At times, C'Vaatk could almost hear the voice of
Myrahg. Even with no mouth by which to speak,
his god would whisper thoughts into his ear,
demanding he free Myrahg from its bindings.
Those thoughts soon enough gave way to action...
Soulblighter's Sacrifice.name: Soulblighter's Sacrifice
Soulblighter's Sacrifice.lore:
At times, C'Vaatk could almost hear the voice of
Myrahg. Even with no mouth by which to speak,
his god would whisper thoughts into his ear,
demanding he free Myrahg from its bindings.
Those thoughts soon enough gave way to action...

mmlore: As the realms grew ever closer, even
the most harmonious sought an
end to the suffering.
Spearpoint of Baelle.name: Spearpoint of Baelle
Spearpoint of Baelle.lore:
As the realms grew ever closer, even
the most harmonious sought an
end to the suffering.

mmlore: The waters of the Celsian Ocean are
home to all sorts of predators. One
wouldn't dare to imagine what lurks
in its darkest depths.

Squid Hunter.lore:
The waters of the Celsian Ocean are
home to all sorts of predators. One
wouldn't dare to imagine what lurks
in its darkest depths.

* D12 Key 1-1 *

mmlore: Warm water bubbles endlessly from every pore of the
coral, making a small puddle in your hand. When the
world is most quiet, and all is held still, you swear you
can faintly hear the sound of it staring at you.
Drifting Colony.name: Drifting Colony
Drifting Colony.lore:
Warm water bubbles endlessly from every pore of the
coral, making a small puddle in your hand. When the
world is most quiet, and all is held still, you swear you
can faintly hear the sound of it staring at you.

mmlore: A people's plea for freedom and your might
clash against the mind of all Mycelia.
<dark_red>Completion of Sporetal Combat and 3
<dark_red>Masterwork are recommended for this boss!
<gray>The Godspore stands resolute in the midst of
<gray>its domain. Its most loyal followers protect it
<gray>from all attacks and must be dealt with swiftly.
<aqua>Players: 1-4 (Infinite attempts)
Grants access to The Godspore.
Blighted Catalyst.name: Blighted Catalyst
Blighted Catalyst.lore:
A people's plea for freedom and your might
clash against the mind of all Mycelia.
Completion of Sporetal Combat and 3
Masterwork are recommended for this boss!
The Godspore stands resolute in the midst of
its domain. Its most loyal followers protect it
from all attacks and must be dealt with swiftly.
Players: 1-4 (Infinite attempts)
Grants access to The Godspore.

mmlore: A blight, then, would have to sever

only direct action could prevent it
from taking control once more.

mmlore: "As I approached the massive tree near
the end of a grove, reality seemed to shift.
Grass, flowers, plants, even the creatures
around me began to wither and die."

mmlore: "I found another corpse when I took
shelter in a ruined building to tend to
my wounds. It clutched this sickle in
its decayed hands. When I touched it,
the corpse collapsed into a black mist.
A chime rang out around me, and I
was forced to flee..."

"I found another corpse when I took
shelter in a ruined building to tend to
my wounds. It clutched this sickle in
its decayed hands. When I touched it,
the corpse collapsed into a black mist.
A chime rang out around me, and I
was forced to flee..."

mmlore: <dark_gray>As the air thins, the dance begins. Jerky,
<dark_gray>twisting gasps. Convulsions. Each twitch is
<dark_gray>another step in a fatal dance.

As the air thins, the dance begins. Jerky,
twisting gasps. Convulsions. Each twitch is
another step in a fatal dance.

Carved from stone at the heart of the

a gigantic narwhal.

a gigantic narwhal.

to wield. Engraved on the blade,
the crest of a bird.

to wield. Engraved on the blade,
the crest of a bird.

mmlore: <dark_gray>There are few sights more beloved than the
<dark_gray>rising of the cooling moon during a voyage across
<dark_gray>dunes of Ishnir. Within the cities, it is the setting
<dark_gray>of the moon that brings joy and heralds Mauta's rise.
Ishnir's Moon.name: Ishnir's Moon
Ishnir's Moon.lore:
There are few sights more beloved than the
rising of the cooling moon during a voyage across
dunes of Ishnir. Within the cities, it is the setting
of the moon that brings joy and heralds Mauta's rise.

mmlore: In the end, all will bow to his
might and become one.

Jungle's Requiem.lore:
In the end, all will bow to his
might and become one.

mmlore: With Hycenea sealed inside Blue alongside Harrakfar,
her grasp over the Wolfswood disappeared entirely.
It did not concern her, however. Her reunion with
Harrakfar was all that she needed.
Last Respects-4.name: Last Respects
Last Respects-4.lore:
With Hycenea sealed inside Blue alongside Harrakfar,
her grasp over the Wolfswood disappeared entirely.
It did not concern her, however. Her reunion with
Harrakfar was all that she needed.

Absorbing the things it needed to take over.

mmlore: Kaul's anger raged through the passages
the Sons of the Forest had slaved over.
As the elements struck them, they were
transformed, and Cazol's grasp on
their loyalty faded. They knew only
Kaul's voice now.
